1b1(mdo sde): // rgyag skad du/ AHku shUl yul
1b2(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ku sha la mu la
1b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa dge ba'i chub yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya
2a1(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang
2a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'athams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
2a3(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa du sa gcig na/ bcom ldan 'a ngas rgyal po'i khab
2a4(mdo sde): na 'od ma'i tshal byi ka lan da ka gnas pa na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan
2b1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi gnas/ gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi
2b2(mdo sde): gnas/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas
2b3(mdo sde): na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong 'bum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs
2b4(mdo sde): gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang sgra bskyangs pa/ dben pa la gnas pa/ nang du
2b5(mdo sde): yang dag 'dzeg la mngon par brtson pa sha steg go/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
3a1(mdo sde): nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
3a2(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / 
3a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pin dang / 
3a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa bskal bad chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po
3a5(mdo sde): dang tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa
3a6(mdo sde): dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa ci 'jigs dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas dang / tshe dang ldan pa mis byin gyi bu dang / tshe
3b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa thang la gnas dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo ki la dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang dbang dang ldan par gyur pa lnga
3b2(mdo sde): brgya tham pa phye 'phred kyi dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag 'jogs las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ bcom
3b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags sprin dang
3b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang // tshe dang ldan pa lhas mchod dang / tshe dang / ldan pa grags pa 'dod dang
3b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dga' sde dang / tshe dang lnga na pa dga' 'dod dang / de dag dang gzhan yang dge slong lnga brgya tham pa lam du zhugs
3b6(mdo sde): ba las/ dbyar mnyan yod na gnas nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'dra
3b7(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems
4a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa/ de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong dang lhan cig tu yul tsam par dbyar gnas nas lam du
4a2(mdo sde): zhugs te/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la
4a3(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / deng
4a4(mdo sde): dpon bzang po dang / phugo sbas dang / mas dbyin dang / dbang pos byin dang / chu lha dang / tshangs lha dang / stobs bzangs dang / bla ma'i blo gros
4a5(mdo sde): dang / khyad par rdzogs dang / 'alagros dang / mthong bdan med dang / legs par yang dag/ zhugs dang / rab kyi rgyal gyis rnam par man/ 
4a6(mdo sde): dang / rtag tu brtson dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / bdud rtsi 'dzin dang / blo gros rab gnas dang / blo gros
4a7(mdo sde): mtha' yas dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / 
4a8(mdo sde): don yod pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / spobs pa chen po dang / spobs pa rnon po dang / spobs pa zab pa dang / 
4b1(mdo sde): spobs pa mtha' yas dang / spobs pa dpag med dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / pad+ma dpal gyi snying po dang / chos 'phags dang / lag na rin chen dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / bskal pa
4b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba mtha' yas par go cha bgos pa dang / bud med 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang / skyes par 'gyur ba'i go cha dgos pa dang / sems can 'gyur ba'i go cha dgos pa dang / mtha' yas khyu mchog dang
4b3(mdo sde): dpag med khyu mchog dang / dmigs pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i khyu mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang tha mi dad par spyod pa'i go cha dgos pa sha stag ste/ 
4b4(mdo sde): yul tha dad pa rnamasu dbyar gnas par gnas nas/ yul rgyu zhing gcig tu 'dus te/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong
4b5(mdo sde): ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas brtso ma ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
4b6(mdo sde): de dag 'dus par thug su chud nas/ rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ rgyal po'i khab grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma
4b7(mdo sde): dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyan ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / 
4b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
5a1(mdo sde): 'du mdzad do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lus 'phags ril dbang po'i brag phug na/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa thams cad kyang dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag da
5a2(mdo sde): khrod pa/ chos gos gsum pa/ cog pu pa/ rtsa'i gding ba pa/ shing drung pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ rab tu dben pa/ chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba sha stag dang / thabs gcig tu 'dug go/ 
5a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dge slong lnga brgya tham pa de dag kyang lhan cig tu lus 'phags ri'i
5a4(mdo sde): dbang po'i brag phug nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i kha dab na 'od ma'i tshil bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na 'dug pa de da lta bu'i rdzu 'phral mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de
5a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring po/ nyid nas 'ongs pa gzigs te/ gzig nas kyang btsem ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
5a6(mdo sde): dag gnas brtan 'od srung chen po 'ong ba 'di ni dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ chos gos gsum pa/ chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba/ bas mtha' gnas mal la gnas pa/ 'dod pa
5a7(mdo sde): chung ba/ chog shes pa/ rab tu dben par gnas pa/ ma 'dres pa/ chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos ji snyed pa ni/ dge slong dag da ltar dge slong 'od
5a8(mdo sde): srung chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag dang mtshungs pa 'dra ba ni/ ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung chos gos gsum pa ni/ lha rnams dang yang smra ba dang / kun tu
5b1(mdo sde): smra bar mi 'dod na/ mi rnams dang lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung tshur
5b2(mdo sde): shog/ 'od srung khyod legs par 'ongs so// kye ma gnas brtan 'od srung gis ni 'di lta ste/ 'dir 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring po nas rnam grangs byas so// 'od srung khyod gdan 'di'i phyed la 'dug
5b3(mdo sde): shig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung la gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bskyod pa dang / stong gsum gyi steng tshon po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
5b4(mdo sde): 'di 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg cing / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur
5b5(mdo sde): to/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ 'di lta ste dper na/ yul ma ga d+ha'i khar ba'i snod/ la lcags kyi thu lum gyis bsnun na/ 'ur 'ur bir ba de bzhin
5b6(mdo sde): du/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po la/ gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan las bskyod nas/ de nas de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi
5b7(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgra skad chen po 'byin to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yos pa'i lha ngas la gtsugs te/ bcom
5b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad tu phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos btugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
6a1(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags la/ bdag ni nyan thos lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
6a2(mdo sde): chos gos sam/ lhung bzed dam/ gdan nam/ de las gzhan pa'i longs spyod rnams nyan thos rnams kyis longs spyod par rngo mi thogs lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni/ lha dang / 
6a3(mdo sde): mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa lags shing / bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das las sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod gang dag blangs pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das mchod
6a4(mdo sde): rten du gyur pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ de dag bdag gis ma skye dad lags so// bcom ldan 'das de slan chad 'dod pa'i rnam dpor rtog pa'i rnam par brtags pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi rnam par
6a5(mdo sde): rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam parags pa 'am/ 'dod chags kyi yongasu gdungs pas gdungs bar gyur pa'am/ zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba dang / gti mug
6a6(mdo sde): gis yongasu gdung bas gdungs par gyur par ma dran lag so// bcom ldan 'das mdor na slob par gyur pa bdag gos bcom ldan 'das las sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mnos pa rnams/ mi slob pa'i sa la
6a7(mdo sde): thug gi bar du spyi bos mnos lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis longs spyad pa'i slad du blangs pa ni ma lags kyi gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa las brtsams nas blangs lag so// bcom ldan
6a8(mdo sde): 'das de dag blings nas/ sems mtho ba 'am/ dma' bar gyur par mi dran log so// bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag chos gos ma mchis pa'i lus la spyad par ma dran lags so// 
6b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod de dag sug pa ma ser bas reg par mi dran lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang du mchi ba de dang der sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag mgos 'tshal cing mchis
6b2(mdo sde): lag so// bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag yan lag mi gtsang ba gang gis kyang reg par mi dran lags/ bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mchod rten du gyur pa de dag
6b3(mdo sde): bcangs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis spangs shing gnang ba lags te/ de dag ni bdag gis bcangs lag so// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa lags par de las gzhan
6b4(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis bdag gzhan du gnas par mi dran lagaso// bdag ji ltar gnas pa na sa la sa'i 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / chu la chu'i 'du shes dang / me la me'i 'du shes
6b5(mdo sde): dang / rlung la rlung gi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / 'jig rten/ 'di'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su/ ma gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang mthong ba dang / zos pa dang // 
6b6(mdo sde): bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyis rje su brtags pa dang / rdza su bsams pa de la yang / bdag 'du shesu ma gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang
6b7(mdo sde): 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes med pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes
6b8(mdo sde): kyi gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa de yang slob pa'i gnas pa dang / mi slob pa'i gnas par bdag gis yang dag par
7a1(mdo sde): rjes su ma mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rje sum mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
7a2(mdo sde): gnas pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong lags ste/ bdag ni de ltar gnas lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ na mkha' bla gab ma mchis pa la ming dang brda' dang gdags pa rnam pa sna tshogs
7a3(mdo sde): bgyis pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ming dang brda' dang gdags pa gang dag gis na mkha' zhes tha snyad du brtags pa dang / na mkha' zhes brdar btags pa dang / nam mkha' zhes brten du bgyis pa dang / bco/ 
7a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das na mkha' zhe 'am/ bla gab ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ ltung pa zhe 'as pa gsog ce'am/ gsob ce 'am/ ya ma brla zhe'am/ gzung ba ma mchis pa zhe'am/ tshad ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ rten ma mchis pa
7a5(mdo sde): zhe 'am/ blang ba ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ dor ba ma mchis pa zhe'/ ma/ lus ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ ji lta ba bzhin zhe 'am/ yongasu dag pa zhe'am/ bar snang zhe'am/ thogs pa ma mchis
7a6(mdo sde): pa zhe'am/ dngos po ma mchis pa zhe'am/ bstan du ma mchis pa zhes de dag dang / gzhan yang tha snyad kyi brda' tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brjod pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ tshad 'di tsam
7a7(mdo sde): 'am/ yongasu bcad pa 'di tsam 'am/ mnyam pa 'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes ming ngam/ brda' 'am/ rten rnams kyis 'tshal bar mi nus lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag de'i phyogs tsam zhig 'chal ba
7a8(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyis kyang / kha dog gam/ dbyibs sam/ dmigs pas na mkha' de tshad 'di tsam dang / mchog 'di tsam zhes bgyi ba ma 'tshal lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang de bzhin gshegs
7b1(mdo sde): pabazhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'am/ ston pa zhe'am/ skyabs she'am/ dpung gnyen zhe 'am/ gnas she'am/ 'dren pa zhe'am/ rnam par 'dren pa zhe'am/ yongasu 'dren pa zhe'am/ sman pa zhe'am/ 
7b2(mdo sde): gso ba bzhe'am/ lam ston pa zhe'am/ lam brjod pa zhe 'am/ gzhan yang tha snyad tha dad pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs brjod pa'i tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis mkhas pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bstod pa
7b3(mdo sde): dang / bkur ba dang / bsngags pa dang / rab tu bstod pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis 'jig rten mngon par brjod pa'i chos de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ma
7b4(mdo sde): 'tshal mi rten ma mthong lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom lnga ngan 'das chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brla dang / ngo bo nyid kyis gsob lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dpar
7b5(mdo sde): bgyi na// sgyu ma mkhan gyis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi ba nas dbang bsku ra ba/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa/ rin po che/ sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhig sprul par gyur
7b6(mdo sde): la bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnam par rgyal bar bgyi ba la gnas pa mtha' yas pa de dag thams cad lhags shing / bcom ldan 'das de la
7b7(mdo sde): lus tha dad par yang gda' la/ bcom ldan 'das de la sems can lus tha dad par yang mthong lags mod kye/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag
7b8(mdo sde): gis ni dpung gi tshogs 'di'i bdag po bya zhing / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis rje su 'jug par bya'o// snyam du mi sems lags la/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po de yang 'di snyam du 'khor los
8a1(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'di ni/ bdag cag gi gtso bo yin pas/ bdag cag ni de'i rje su 'jug par bya'o snyam du mi sems lags mod kyis/ de dag de'i rje su 'jug par bgyid par yang gang
8a2(mdo sde): lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos de dag gi chos nyid gang lags pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ nyan thos sam/ slob pa'am/ mi slob pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam// 
8a3(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
8a4(mdo sde): nyid brten pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid rten pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid dmigs
8a5(mdo sde): pa'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid mngon pa'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid rten pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid dmigs pa'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid mngon pa'am/ so so skye bo'i chos nyid
8a6(mdo sde): rten pa 'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid dmigs pa'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid rten pa 'am/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
8a7(mdo sde): chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mngon pa'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid rten par mi 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la gzugs stong pa dang / 'dis gzugs
8a8(mdo sde): stong pa dang / 'di la gzugs stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / 'dis rnam par sheb stong pa dang / 'di la rnam par shes pa
8b1(mdo sde): stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang / 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
8b2(mdo sde): chos nyid stong pa dang / 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dmigs par mi 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ de la nyan thos ma
8b3(mdo sde): mchis/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid ma mchis/ so so'i skye bo ma mchis/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid kyi bar du ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'am
8b4(mdo sde): dpung gi tshogs sprul pa de la 'khor los sgyur ba ma mchis/ 8 dpung gi tshogs ma mchis lag so// sgyu ma la ma mchis/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid la ma mchis/ sgyu ma mkhan rnams la ma
8b5(mdo sde): mchis lag so// sa la ma mchis/ chu la ma mchis/ me la/ ma mchis/ rlung la ma mchis/ na mkha' la ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa la ma mchis lag so// sa dang / chu dang / me
8b6(mdo sde): dang / rlung dang / na mkha'i khams rnams la ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni de dang 'dra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la
8b7(mdo sde): bdag ni rlomasam su mi bgyid/ de dag la bdag ni byung bar ma gyur/ de dag bdag gis ni ma smras lag so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag ni yon tan gyi chos rnams nyid las dben pa lags pas/ 
8b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams rjes su dran par bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das don lam lags/ do ni tshul lags te/ lam de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo las de rjes su
9a1(mdo sde): thob pa rnams ni 'di snyam gzhan yang dag par blangs la 'jug par bya zhing / ston pa yang gzhan btsal bar bya la/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan smra ba'i gdong du gyen du blta bar bya
9a2(mdo sde): zhing / tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni shes bzhin pas shes/ mthong bzhin pas mthong / yang dag pa'i lta ba yang 'dogs bzhin pas 'dogs par byed do// snyam du mi sems lags te/ da ni gnas ma mchis
9a3(mdo sde): lag so// bcom ldan 'das gnas pa 'di la ni bdag som nyi ma mchis pas thob par gnas lag so// chos kyi sgo de yang rjes su thob pas gnas lags// chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ dben pa'i
9a4(mdo sde): tshul dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i tshul dag gis tshul gcig pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ chos
9a5(mdo sde): kyi the tshom zhu bar 'tshal ba lags la/ de bzhin gshegs bas kyang bdag la skabs phye ba lags te/ dbang po'i brag phug nas 'od ma'i tshal 'dir phyin pa lag so// bcom ldan
9a6(mdo sde): 'das bdag 'dir mchis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan gyi phyed gnang ste/ bdag la gnang ba na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rab tu 'ur 'ur zhing rnam pa
9a7(mdo sde): drug tu yang rab tu g.yos lags// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag nyid chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang / rgya chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang
9a8(mdo sde): slob dpon ma mchis shing rang byung ba lags kyang / thugs rje chen po'i tshul la bzhugs shing / lhag pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa la bzhugs nas/ bdag la gdan gyi phyed/ 
9b1(mdo sde): gnang ba ngo mtshar lagaso snyam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyin mi dbul po 'tsho ba ngan pa chags kyis 'tsho bzhig chags kyis khyim gyi phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs nas/ rgyal po rgyal
9b2(mdo sde): rigs spro ba nas dbang bskur ba dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i gan du blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / dri bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchis par gyur la mchis pa de la des
9b3(mdo sde): stan gyi phyed stsal na/ de nas de 'di snyam du sems lags te/ rgyal po la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir bdag song du zin kyang bdag gis blta ba 'am/ phyag bya ba yang dka' bar 'gyur na/ gsol pa/ 
9b4(mdo sde): lta ci smos/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ bdag phyin ma thag pa la stan gyi phyed byin du zin kyang 'don pa mtshar re snyam bgyid lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
9b5(mdo sde): du chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rang byung ba slob dpon ma mchis pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis
9b6(mdo sde): kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba lags na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
9b7(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ chos kyi the tsom zhu ba dang / blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag ji lta ji ltar mchis pa na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
9b8(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems lags te/ bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba rnyed cing / phyag bgyi ba rnyed la/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang / yongs su zhu bar bgyi ba rnyed de/ bcom
10a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis da ltar bdag 'dir lta mchis pa la gdan gyi phyed gnang ba ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi dbul po des/ 
10a2(mdo sde): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de la blta ba nyid dang / phyag bgyi ba nyid yang ngo mtshar lags pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni byams pa chen
10a3(mdo sde): po dang ldan zhing thugs rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa legs kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gang dag lags pa de dag ston pa ma gtogs par/ 
10a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du/ bdag ni phul dang bdag ni mchog dang / bdag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o snyam du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag ni 'di snyam du de bzhin
10a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs// rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan de dag ni nyan thos// dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags so// 
10a6(mdo sde): snyam bgyid lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung leg so legs so// 'od srung khyod yang leg so// 'od srung de
10a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med cing dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan te/ de ni sbyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / shes rab kyi bar gyi tshad de lta bu dang / shes
10a8(mdo sde): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / smon lam rnams kyi chad de lta bu dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / thabs kyi tshad de lta bu dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
10b1(mdo sde): pa'i chad de lta bu dang / spyod pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i chad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol
10b2(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bus dpag par mi nus so// 'od srung bzhi po 'odi dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
10b3(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i ye shes rnams yin te/ de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa
10b4(mdo sde): nyid dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos na nyam pa nyid de/ 'od srung mnyam pa'i ye shes bzhi po de dag ni gang dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang
10b5(mdo sde): na bzhugs shing / seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par byed pa 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas 'jig rten bsam yas
10b6(mdo sde): na// sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas te// sems kyi las ni sbyangs pas na// de dag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs byed// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs byed pa ni// mu stegs gzhan rnams skrag par 'gyur// chos kyi chos
10b7(mdo sde): nyid thos nas su// g.yang sar rab tu ltung bar 'gyur// bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas dang // sems can 'du shes gang gnas pa// 'od srung de dag bstan 'di la// mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do// 
10b8(mdo sde): dngos po'i 'du shes gang gnas dang // nga'i nga zhes rten pa dang // 'od srung de dag bstan 'di la// mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do// gang dgi tshul khrims phung po dang // bsam gtan rnams dang thos mang
11a1(mdo sde): gis// rlom sems rnams rmongs de dag ni// 'od srung mu stegs can rnams so// bdag ni chog shes 'dod chung dang // rab tu dben la gnas pa dang / chos gos ngan pa 'chang snyam pa// 'od
11a2(mdo sde): srung don mu steg so// dper nan mkha' 'ad la ni// lag pa bskyod kyang thogs med cing // dper na mkha' la rdul gyis kyang // nam yang gos par mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin 'od srung ngas bstan pa'i// chos 'dir
11a3(mdo sde): gang dag gnas de dag/ nyon mongs rnams kyi mi gos te// mkha' las rdul dang sprin bzhin no// ji ltar mkha' la mi yis me tog spos rnams dang // de bzhin phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis 'dir mchod kyang // 
11a4(mdo sde): bdag mchos la la skye 'gyur 'jig par 'gyu ro zhes// de la blo gos kyang ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar na mkha' de ngal gos par mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar rang bzhin gos par mi
11a5(mdo sde): 'gyur dang // ji ltar rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyis gsob// de ba zhin dge sbyong dag la stong pa'i chos rnams so// ji ltar ga/ nga gis na mkha' bsdogs pa dang // ji ltar nam du yang ni gshe
11a6(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin dge sbyong dag la chos rnams gang dag yin// de dag na mkha' bzhin du gos pa med chos rnams// chos 'di dge sbyong gang dag legs par bslabs rnams dang // gzhan
11a7(mdo sde): dag slob pa rnams dang slob par 'gyur ba rnams// 'di la nam du yang ni gang dag chags par mi 'gyur ba// nga yis de dag dge sbyong legs bslabs rnamasu bstan// ji ltar mkha' la nam yang lag
11a8(mdo sde): pa mi thogs dang // rdul dang du ba rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar lam ni nam yang byed par mi 'gyur ba// chos la de bzhin mos pa rnams ni dge sbyong yin// ji ltar sprin dang bral bar gyur
11b1(mdo sde): pa'i namakha' la// zla ba thogs pa med pas mkha' la 'gro byed kyang // bdag gis par snang la ni snang bar bya snyam du// de la rnam rtog de ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur bzhin// rgod med bdag nyid dge slong na
11b2(mdo sde): blta bu yi// sbyin pa'i bdag po'i khyim rnamasu ni 'gro bar bya// rgod med nga rgyal rnam grol sems dang ldan pa dang // 'jig rten chos rnams kyis ni ma gos sems ldan bya// khyim rnams la ni nga rgyal spangs
11b3(mdo sde): nas bsten par bya// der phyin nas kyang chos nyid rab tu brjod par bya// bde dang rnyed pa'i phyir ni 'dod pa'ang spangs nas su// 'jig rten rnam dag tshul khrims can du gnas par bya// de nas bcom
11b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung longs shig longs la rang gi stan la 'dug shig/ 'od srung khyod la chos kyi the tsom ji snyed yod pa de
11b5(mdo sde): dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / 'od srung ngas dris pa la lan btab pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya/ 'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po si'i steng de nas langs
11b6(mdo sde): te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ 'dzam bu'i/ 
11b7(mdo sde): gling 'di na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
11b8(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
12a1(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang / 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par bzhugs te/ de dag zhugs nas
12a2(mdo sde): mtha' las shing dpog tu med par shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon
12a3(mdo sde): bar 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs po chen po dang / 'od gas po dang / me che ba
12a4(mdo sde): dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal de'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa gal ba dang
12a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom lda na 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te
12a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang rdzu 'phral ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ klu'i rgyal po
12a7(mdo sde): / rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / snam bu'i dbang phyug dang / go'u ta mo dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / gzi can dang / 'jog po dang / rab mdzes dang / e la'i 'dab dang / de dag dang gzhan yang klu bye ba phrag stong // sangs
12a8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das gal bder dang ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ste/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod cing rgya chen po'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
12b1(mdo sde): ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka gan+da/ 
12b2(mdo sde): par zhugs nas/ gcig la gcig nyam nga ba med pas 'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po
12b3(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/ me'u dgal gyi bu khyod longs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
12b4(mdo sde): yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam rabasgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang
12b5(mdo sde): dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad chos la ya/ nga dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya yang / dag par ston par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
12b6(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur// sbyin
12b7(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa'i bar du yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi sgo bsgrub pa yang dag par
12b8(mdo sde): ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas pa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ 'khor bzhi yang dag par
13a1(mdo sde): tshim par byed par 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor kyang yang dag par tshim par byed
13a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / de bzhin du da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa
13a3(mdo sde): dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam rnams dang / ye shes kyi phyogs tsam zhig yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
13a4(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyigadan 'phang du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten srid cig bsham so// / steng gi bar snang la yang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chags rin
13a5(mdo sde): po che sna bdun las byas pa/ ka tsa lin de'i gos ltar reg na de bsrid kyi tshad ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang ldan pa/ rgyar ni dpag tshad bdun brgya dang ldan pa zhig bya'o// 'chags de
13a6(mdo sde): la yang rtsig pa rim pa bdun dang / rta babs bdun dang / stegs bu rim pa bdun dang / dril bu gseyer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor basprul to// 'chags de'i g.yas gso su yang 'di lta ste/ gser
13a7(mdo sde): dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUn rin po ches zin po shing ldan pa dag mngon par sprul to// gser las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la dngul gyi lo ma dag dang / shel gyi me tog dang / be nun las byas
13a8(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu dag dang / dngul yis byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi la mi dag dang / bain+dun+da los byas pa'i mi tig dag dang / shol las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dang / baitsun las byas
13b1(mdo sde): shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / dngul gyi me tog dag dang / shel gyi 'bras bu dag dang / shel las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / dngul gyi me tog dag dang
13b2(mdo sde): baiDUR+Ya las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag mngon par sprul to// shong ljon pa thams cad kyi bar dag tu yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ba'i rdzing them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ them skas de dag kyang
13b3(mdo sde): rin po che sna bzhi'i gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa/ gser gyi bye ma gdal ba/ ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs pa/ steng gi bar snang la yang
13b4(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dra ba'i bla res bris pa zhigamangon par sprul to// 'chags de yang dar gyi lda ldi mang pos sbyangs pa/ bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs pa/ mi bdun
13b5(mdo sde): gyi srid tsam du me tog sna tshogs kyi bcal bkram pa zhig mdza na par sprul to// ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / kun mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po de dag la yang mo'u dgal gyi bu dang 'dra ba'i
13b6(mdo sde): dge slong dag mngon par sprul to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis byas pa'i gdan de lta bu de mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin nas 'di skad
13b7(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gdan bshams lags na/ de'i dus la dbab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
13b8(mdo sde): pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis gdan bshams zin tam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bshams lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
14a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
14a2(mdo sde): seng ge'i khri shoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas/ sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur
14a3(mdo sde): ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gdan bsham so// gdan de shems
14a4(mdo sde): pan byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyi sa/ seng ge'i gdan der rang rang gi bla gos dag bting ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis ni 'od/ 
14a5(mdo sde): lta ste/ the tsam dang som nyi bsal ba'i phyir/ rdzu 'phral mngon pa/ ra 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad pa sgrub pa dang / 'jug pa sgrub pa/ 
14a6(mdo sde): dang / smon lam bsgrub pa dang / zhing bkod pa bsgrub pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i
14a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa byung ba dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / chos bstan pa phun
14a8(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang / midag phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phu na sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa dang / 
14b1(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi chos gos dag las mthong bar 'gyur
14b2(mdo sde): bde lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba des mngon par 'du bya'o snyam// de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang mkhyen bzhin du gdan de la bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas
14b3(mdo sde): kyang yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
14b4(mdo sde): de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rang rang gi/ bla gos ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gdon du bting ngo // de dag gis rang rang gi chos gos de dag la bdag nyid
14b5(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa na/ sa/ rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa bar du yang mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag
14b6(mdo sde): yang dag par tshim zhing yid rangs te dga' ba dang / dang ba la gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sgra skad 'thun par chagasu bcad de bstod pa/ cho ga spyod pa yon tan gnas gyur pa// chos rnams kun
14b7(mdo sde): la dbang ldan bsnyengs mi mnga'// yon tan kun la gnas pas khyod mdzes te// rgyal ba dbang ldan ting 'dzin yang dag gnas// g.yo dang sgyu ni khyod las yang mi mnga'// nga rgyal rgod dang tshul 'chos mi
14b8(mdo sde): mnga' ste// rig dang rnam grol dag gi spyod pa mkhyen// ting 'dzin de la gnas pas khyod mdzeso// dbang ldan pastengs bral ting 'dzin gnas na su// rdzu 'phrul mi mtshungs bla na med pa bstan// chags
15a1(mdo sde): med ye shes bstan phyir dbang ldan pa// ma 'ongs dus ni khyod kyis deng bstan to// mi g.yo go 'phang zhi ba thob snyam bgyid// de ring byang chub la ni mchis snyam bgyid// bdud dpung bcas
15a2(mdo sde): pa rab tu bcom snyam bgyid// de ring rig pa rjesu thob snyam bgyid// rgyal bas gang gis 'dus byas stong gzigs pa'i// bla med mig ni thob par 'gyur snyam bgyid// chags med ye shes khyod kyi
15a3(mdo sde): bka' drin la// mig kyang chags pa mchis pa yod ma lags// rnam par mthong yang ci yang ma mthong zhing // chos ni gang la'ang zhe 'gras ma mchis te// gang la yid no zhe 'gras ma mchis pa// 
15a4(mdo sde): de ni sangs rgyas spyan mchog de lag so// ji ltar rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyan mchog gis// khams gsum shes la ma chags 'jug pa bzhin// dngos dang dngos med mnyam mtshungs yid
15a5(mdo sde): dang ldan// yang dge brtson zhing rang gi mig la gnas// gang tshe// rgyal po ting 'dzin der gnas te// de ring de dag kun gyis/ thob snyam bgyid// de dag gis ni gzungs sgo de dag dang // 
15a6(mdo sde): chos la rnam par grol ba'i sgo mchog thob// sgor 'jug yongasu sbyang ba rnam dag pa// rgyal ba'i blo ni yong ye nyams mi 'gyur// smyon pa chen po'i rnam smin de 'dra ste/ khrims chen yon tan de dag de
15a7(mdo sde): 'dra lags// shes rab chen po'i yon tan de 'dra ste// sngon cad chos de dag ni bsten pa mdzad// khyod ni gdan bzhugs bsam gtan mdzad pa na// mi yi dbang po phyogs bcur lhang nge gyur// rgyal
15a8(mdo sde): sras thugs kyi sras po 'dus de dag/ gang nas shi 'phos las ni ci mchis pa// lha dang klu dang mi min mi 'am ci// kun la de ring shes pa de 'jug/ kun tu snang bar gyur pa'i ting 'dzin la// gang gi
15b1(mdo sde): bskal byer shes pa de bskyed pa// som nyi gcod cing the tsom sel ba yis// mi mchog seng ge bzhin du sgrogs par gyur// bdag dang gzhan la phan pa tshol ba na// 'di ltar sngon chad sbyin pa bsal lags
15b2(mdo sde): te// 'di la sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson gang // sems can kun la de 'drar bskal pa mnyam// sems can de dag thams cad ma btud par// 'di la sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson gang // sem
15b3(mdo sde): can kun la kun tu mkhas pas na// 'di la ting 'dzin 'jug dang shes rab mchog/ des na khyod kyis ting 'dzin rnam par sbyangs// dpa' bo de ring gdan la bzhugs pa la// thal mo sbyar nas khyod
15b4(mdo sde): la zhus lags na// som nyi gcad cing the tsom bsal du gso/ la// deng 'dir chos la kun tu snang thob cing // the tsom bra/ la te snang ba thob gyur pas// sems can gang dag 'byung dang
15b5(mdo sde): bdag cag la// chos kyi tshul ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur// gleng bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // yang de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba gzhon
15b6(mdo sde): nur gyur pa zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug/ de nas pad+ma dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lda nga sa la gtsugs te/ 
15b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'dug go// de ltar 'dug pa de'i sems la rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi sgo rnams
15b8(mdo sde): zhu bar 'dod pa yin// rdo rje'i tshig rnams/ rgyun mo chod pa'i bsgrub pa'i tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin/ smra ba thams cad char gcad pa bsgrub pa'i tshig rnams dang / rim par phye ba'i tshig rnams dang / 
16a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad bsdu ba'i tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag phyag rgya'i sgo gang dag la bslabs na/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mig
16a2(mdo sde): dang shes pa la mkhas pa nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag gis bsam pa'i tshogs gang dag dang 'jug pa bsgrub pa gang dag gis go cha bgos pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
16a3(mdo sde): tshogs skye ba la bsam pa bsgrub pa'i tshogs la dgongs par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad+ma dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing smon lam
16a4(mdo sde): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsgrub pa thugasu chud nas/ de'i tshe phyogs bzhir rnam par gzig so// phyogs bzhir gzi dgas pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer
16a5(mdo sde): chen po bzhi byung ste/ de dag byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams ma tha' yas mu med pa dag tu dong ngo // 'od zer de dag kyang shing ljon pa 'am/ rtsig pa 'am/ ri 'am/ sa 'am/ bar snang gang
16a6(mdo sde): du bab pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog gcig par gyur to// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du yang 'od zer de dag thogs pa med par rab tu dong ste/ de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen
16a7(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'od de dag gis reg pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang gi lus dag gser gyi lus lta bur shes// gang dag 'dod chags kyi yongasu gdung bas yongs
16a8(mdo sde): su gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gi yongasu gdungs pa dang / gti mug gi yongasu gdung bas yongasu gdungs pa de dag thams cad kyis ni bdag nyid 'dod chags chung ba dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug
16b1(mdo sde): chung bar mngon par shes so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba ji snyed yod pa de dag tu sems can skyes pa gang dag sdug bsngal tsha ba mi zad pa mchi ba'i
16b2(mdo sde): mthar byed pa'i tshor ba nyam su myong de dag thams cad kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus bde ba snyam du shes par gyur to// stong gsum gyi
16b3(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur pa'i sems can ji
16b4(mdo sde): snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi
16b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba cher gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyis spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer dag phyung ste/ 'od zer de dag kyang shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad
16b6(mdo sde): med pa dag 'das so// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag 'daso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de dag phyung nas/ gsung gsal bI
16b7(mdo sde): sgra mdzad/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon par go bar gyur to// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
16b8(mdo sde): gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
17a1(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
17a2(mdo sde): chen po dra ba can gyi 'od 'di ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
17a3(mdo sde): bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsung
17a4(mdo sde): gsal ba'i sgra dang / 'od kyi snang ba chen po de gda' ba de su'i da lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
17a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas/ byang chub sa mas dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams tshad
17a6(mdo sde): med grangs med pa dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
17a7(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde gnod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// 'khor der byang
17a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dpal gyi snying pi zhes bya ba 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol
17b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyag rgya'i yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo zhu bar 'dod do// dra ba can gyi 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ tha mi
17b2(mdo sde): da par spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod do// dra ba can gyi 'od byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de dag dang ldan pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
17b3(mdo sde): dag kyang steng so// dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag mthong ba dang / thos pa yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gces smras
17b4(mdo sde): byed par nga smra na/ dra ba can gyi 'od gang dag gis de dag mthong nas bkur bsti byed dam/ bla mor byed dam/ ri mor byed dam/ mchod pa byed dmo// dri bar byed pa lta ci smos/ de nas de bzhin
17b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das
17b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha dgos pa de dag blta
17b7(mdo sde): ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de yang blta bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas/ byang chub sems/ 
17b8(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na/ song la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du yang spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir
18a1(mdo sde): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bsnyen pa'i dka' ba'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po chen
18a2(mdo sde): bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la lags pa lta bu'i ud pa la byin te/ dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la khyod kyis lag pa lta bu'i
18a3(mdo sde): ut+pal 'dis mchod cig/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 
18a4(mdo sde): stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ snyun gsol lo// zhes de skad ces gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dang / da' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od/ de bzhin gshegs pa
18a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
18a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dag dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der song ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dug par gyur to// de nas
18a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas pa ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der yang song ste phyin nas/ bcom
18a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalo// bcom
18b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lag so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha lo// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
18b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra bcan gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dra ba can gyi 'od khyod yun ring du 'tshe bar gyur cig/ khyod bde ba dang nad med par gyur cig/ de nas
18b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra yan gyi 'od bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / byang chub sems
18b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa/ bcom ldan 'dra/ 
18b5(mdo sde): la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gso la to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
18b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di yang bskur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba
18b7(mdo sde): can gyi 'od las lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la bzhesu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la bzhes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la byin no// de nas byang chub sems
18b8(mdo sde): dpa' ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la thogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la sogs pa lnga brgya la smras pa/ rgan rabs dag lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
19a1(mdo sde): pas byin pa'o// de nas bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal de thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
19a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa lags na/ ci bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang dag gis ming thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad
19a3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas bdag cag la srul lags te/ 
19a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di/ rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / bsam pa'i stobs dang / sems can thams cad yongs su
19a5(mdo sde): mi gtong po'i stobs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i slad du/ lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de gto nga bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs na de bzhin
19a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs te/ 'chi zhing gzhes pa dag/ gang dag ma byung ba dag dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag dang / 'byung ba 'am 'jig pa
19a7(mdo sde): der yang bcom ldan 'das gtor bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs dang / 
19a8(mdo sde): de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu yang gtor bar bgyi'o/ 
19b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang su dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ut+pa la'i dri sdom par gyur cig/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ 
19b2(mdo sde): tu nges par gyur cig/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang mchi bar gyur cig/ de dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de gtor nas/ de nas de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis phyog g.yas
19b3(mdo sde): pas reg ste/ lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de bcom ldan 'das kyis reg nas kyang de nas de ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la ut+pa la de'i nang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed mngon par byung zhing ut+pa
19b4(mdo sde): re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i byed mngon par byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed po de dag gis/ gang drag chos thams cad sgyu me lta bu'i mi shes shing mes par/ 
19b5(mdo sde): mi byed la/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa dang / chos thams/ cad mtshan nyid med par mi shes shing mos par mi byed// khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag gi ston pa ni/ de bzhi
19b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa ma yin zhing / de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag kyang ma yin no zhes de lta bu'i tshig de dag gsungs te/ gsungs nas kyang bzhud do// tshig su bcad pa 'di dag kyang bka'
19b7(mdo sde): stsal to// sgyu ma 'dra chos gzung du med pa ste// gzung min thams cad chu zla 'dra ba yin// stong pas stong pa'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin pa// chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas de 'drar gsungs// mtshan nyid med
19b8(mdo sde): chos rnam dge mtshan nyid yin// mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin de 'dra ste// rtags pas stong zhing bdag med chos rnams la// 'dzin pa med cing rtsod pa med par 'gyur// gang dag de ltar chos nyid de
20a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa/ de dag ston pa rgyal ba mthu bo che// phyogs bcur 'jig rten spyod pa thams cad la// de 'dra 'di ni de'i byin brlab so// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de dag gis tshig su
20a2(mdo sde): bcad pa de dag gsungs nas phyogs bcur bzhad do// // bam po gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces
20a3(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis ci tsam du smon lam dag shin tu yongs su spangs pa dang / sems can gang dag gis de dag gi smon lam de dag thos pa dang ming yang bsgrags
20a4(mdo sde): pa de dag sdug bsngal mang pos reg pa'i sdug bsngal de dag la ngas yongs su thar par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubu nges par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar
20a5(mdo sde): lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang becom ldan 'das dang rigs kyi bu de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'a/ byung ba'i cha ma lag so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
20a6(mdo sde): dper bgyi na/ skyes pa 'am bud med la la zhig rin thang ma mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che dri ma thams cad dang bral ba/ phan pa dang bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i
20a7(mdo sde): yon tan bsgrags pa thos nas/ yongasu btsal bar sems shing / nor bu rin po che de'i mtshan ma dag kyang legs par 'dzin par bgyid la chab khung sa 'am/ de las gzhan mi gtsang ba dang 'dres
20a8(mdo sde): ba'i phyogs dag na nor bu rin po che shin tu yongs su byang ba de 'dam bu bsal ba mthong zhing lhag par yang nor bu rin po che de'i khor yug na/ smig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ gdol pa'i rigs
20b1(mdo sde): sam/ g.yung po'i rigs sam/ de dag las gzhan yang tshegs kyis 'tsho ba dma' ba'i rigs dag mchis par gyur na/ de dag ni nor bu rin po che de'i ming yang ma 'tshal na/ yon tan 'tshal bar
20b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni gnas ma mchis lag so// de nas mi des mi gtsang bar bsal ba'i nor bu rin po che mthong nas/ nor bu rin po che de'i snod ni mdzes pa ma yin no zhes de
20b3(mdo sde): skad ces smra bar bgyid la/ de nas dma' ba'i mi de dag 'di skad ces smra bar bgyid de/ khyod kyis gang gis bsngags pa smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de gang yin zhes/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mi
20b4(mdo sde): des nor bu rin po che de bstan la/ de ston pa na/ mi byis pa'i rang bzhin can de dag ma 'tshal bzhin du/ kye mi khyad kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan ci'i phyir smras/ khyod kyis
20b5(mdo sde): gang smras pa'i nor bu rin po che'i de'i yon tan de dag ni yod/ ba ma yin no// khyod ni brdzun du smra ba gzhan du smra ba ste/ khyod kyi tshig de dag yid mi ches so zhes smras la/ de'i tshe mi
20b6(mdo sde): des nor bu rin po che de mi gtsang ba'i gnas de nas mngon par btog cing blangs nas mchis te/ de nas nor bu rin po che phyung nas mi de mchis ma thag tu/ mi dbul ba'i rang bzhin can de dag
20b7(mdo sde): gcig la gcig shin tu rab tu rnam par 'khrug par gyur nas/ de'i rjes la gnod pa mang pos yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan
20b8(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dbul pos bltam par mchis lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'das gyi snod du bsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de
21a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i rang bzhin gyi mo nges nga 'tshal ba de lta bur na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na bdag cag da lta bar 'gyu'o// bcom ldan 'das/ 
21a2(mdo sde): ji ltar bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de legs par spangs shing rnam par dag pa de lta bur ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub
21a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nor bu rin po che de'i 'khor yug na dma' bas 'tsho
21a4(mdo sde): ba dbul pos dma' ba'i mi de dag gnas pa de dgad ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ni de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams blta
21a5(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar skyes pa/ 'am/ bud med kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan thos nas// norabu rin po che de yongasu btsal bar sems shing
21a6(mdo sde): mi gtsang ba'i snod na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas kyang / nor bu rin po che de'i snod de ni 'tshal ba ma yin no zhes smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu
21a7(mdo sde): dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes sangs rgyas bcom
21a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha dgos pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper
21b1(mdo sde): bgyi na/ skyes pa'am bud med kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag thos nas yongasu btsal bar sems shing / mi gtsang ba'i snod na mchis pa de yang mthong nas snod de ni 'tsham
21b2(mdo sde): ba ma yin no zhes tshig smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang
21b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas blta ba'i slad du bdag cag 'dir mchis te
21b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchi/ denas bdag gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnod pa/ brgya phrag du mas bltam zhing sems
21b5(mdo sde): can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa dag gis bltam par mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyid na/ 'dam du sprul ba'i nor bu
21b6(mdo sde): rin po che de'i 'od de mi 'dor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
21b7(mdo sde): go cha bgos pa de dag gi 'od de mi 'dor lags te/ 'dir ni sems can rnams kyis bsam pa dang / mos pa chung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od 'dom gang tsam
21b8(mdo sde): du byin gyis rlob par mdzad lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyid na/ mi de nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag sgrogs pa na/ mi dbul ba'i rang bzhin can de dag mngon
22a1(mdo sde): par ying mi ches pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od shin tu rgyas pa'am/ smon lam chen po'am
22a2(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dag la'ang yid ches par mi bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi lta smos kyang ci 'tshal
22a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ mi des mi gtsang ba'i snod de nas nor bu rin po che de blangs nas mchis la/ de mchis ma thag tu yang sems can de dag tu yang gnod pa rnam pa du
22a4(mdo sde): mas shas cher yongasu bskor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan la das 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
22a5(mdo sde): po de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis nas 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du stsol ba rnams gcig la
22a6(mdo sde): gcig rab tu rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi sgo yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ chos ma lags pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung ba kho nar bas so zhes de skad ces gsol ba lags so// 
22a7(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can de dag ni chos ma lags pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing chos ma lags pas 'tsho ba nyid yang dag par blangs nas gnas par 'gyur la
22a8(mdo sde): gcig la gcig 'thab mo dang / sun 'byin pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / smod pa la 'jug par bgyid par 'gyur te/ de dag gcig la gcig dge ba'i chos las nyams nas// 
22b1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur zhing / de dag chos sogs pa dang dge ba sogs balhur len par mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo don 'chas
22b2(mdo sde): bi/ don yongasu tshol bar 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skye bar mi bgyi
22b3(mdo sde): nabyang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas lta smos kyang ci 'tshol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med po dang / yang
22b4(mdo sde): seMs dong / thig nag dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang da/ de dag las zhan pa sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag la skad cig thang
22b5(mdo sde): cig yud tsam yang bde ba mi dmigs pa de bzhin dubacom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i 'jig rten gyi
22b6(mdo sde): khams rin po che'i gdugs gcig pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag mchis pa de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ sems can mnar med par skyes pa rnams
22b7(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dir skyes pa de dag la yang bde ba ci yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba gci ga bu mchog tu
22b8(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag ni rang bzhin gyi bde ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can 'dir skyes pa rnams kyis de mngon par yid ches par
23a1(mdo sde): dka' bar 'gyur bar sA lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang chos kyi the tsom bcad pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mnyan pa'i slad du/ gang gis don du bdag 'dir/ 
23a2(mdo sde): mchis pa de bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag thos par 'tshal lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba dang sdug bsngal de dag thams cad mi rtag pa legs pa'i
23a3(mdo sde): slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las gang la bde ba ma mchis pa dang / sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang / rtag
23a4(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa dang / mi rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rtog pa mam chis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma
23a5(mdo sde): mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus byas ma mchis pa/ dang / 'dus ma byas ma mchis pa dang / gdags/ pa ma mchis pa dang / gdags pa ma mchis pa ma mchis
23a6(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa ma mchis pa dang / zag pa ma marmi ba ma mchis pa dang / bden pa
23a7(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang / brdzun pa ma mchis pa dang / byang chub ma mchis pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis pa dang / stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang / snang ba ma
23a8(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / mun pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / 'bras bu
23b1(mdo sde): ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang la ma mchis pa dang / lam ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jug pa ma mchis pa dang / mthar thug pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten ma mchis pa
23b2(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten nas nges par 'byung ba ma mchis pa rnam pa de lta bu'i chos thos par 'tshal lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs las yang dag
23b3(mdo sde): par byung ba kun rtogs pa las byung ba'i bde ba de dag dang gzhan thams cad 'jig rten la bstan par bgyi ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bstan du mi rung lags
23b4(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das de la stobs rnams ma mchis mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul ma de mchis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ma mchis
23b5(mdo sde): kun brjod pa ma mchis/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis rjes su bstan pa ma mchis/ rjes bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis lags so// 
23b6(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis shing / stobs rnams ma mchis la bde ba ma mchis shing / sdug bsngal ma mchis lags te/ de dag thams cad ni rlom sems lags
23b7(mdo sde): shing / de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid rjes su mi thob pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes zhi
23b8(mdo sde): ba'i grangs su mchi ba ma lags te/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba dang rlom sems dang / g.yos pa dang spros pa lags pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
24a1(mdo sde): ni bden pa'am/ brdzun pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa'am/ kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa
24a2(mdo sde): 'am/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims sam/ stobs rnams sam/ stobs ma mchis/ 
24a3(mdo sde): pa'am/ mi 'jigs pa'am/ mi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'am/ sbyin gnas sam/ sbyin gnas ma lags pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub
24a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'am/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ smon lam rnams sam/ byin gyisadabarlabs rnams kyi rlom sems thams cad yang dag par
24a5(mdo sde): bcom zhing lam yongs su mkhyen te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bag chab mi mnga' bar seng ge lta budang / glang po che lta bu'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad lagaso/ 
24a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na mi 'thun pa rnams la mi 'thun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad/ 'thun pa rnams la 'thun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad do// de bzhin
24a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni bzhed na dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du/ de gnyis gas kyang gtang snyoms par gnas par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de dag
24a8(mdo sde): ni/ sang+yas kyi gnas pa dag dang / rang byung gi gnas pa dag dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang yang thun mongs ma lags pa'i gnas pa dag lags na/ de dag las gzhan
24b1(mdo sde): ba'i sems can tha chad rnams dang thun mong ma lags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thun mongs ma lags she na/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can tha chad kyis de lta/ 
24b2(mdo sde): bu'i gnas pa dag dang / de snyed kyis gnas pa de dag dang / yun ji srid nas gnas pa de dag dang / sbyor ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang / bde ba de lta bu'i gan pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi
24b3(mdo sde): thog cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyis gnas pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thog pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sems can
24b4(mdo sde): gzhan dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing / de bzhin gshegs/ dpa'i gnas pa de lta bu de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sad/ sa rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags te/ bcom
24b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das spyod yul ma lags pa shes bgyi ba ni spyod pa ma mchis shing / rnam par spyod pa ma mchis pa ste/ de bas na spyod yul ma logs shes bgyi'o// de ci'i
24b6(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos dog gam/ rang sangs rgyas dag gi spyod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na// bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de mtha' yas pa'i
24b7(mdo sde): slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gnas pa mtha' yas pa lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis mos pa ni mtha' yas te/ gang gis kyang 'tshal
24b8(mdo sde): bar rngo mi thogs lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de ni yig ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ge ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags la
25a1(mdo sde): yi ga ni brjod pa kho na lags pas/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de ni rang byung gi gnas pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag gnas pa de la
25a2(mdo sde): rnam par blta bar mi 'gyur zhing / rab tu 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas shi 'phos pa lag so// gang dag gnas pade glo bar chud par
25a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das don gyi sgo dang chos kyi sgo de lags
25a4(mdo sde): te/ 'khor sgo drug khri brgyad stong dang ldan pa lag so// de bzhi na gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa'i byang chub ni na mkha' lta bur tshad ma mchis shing / byang chub sems
25a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sgo gcig pa'i tshad las rjesu thob pa lag so// sgo'i tshig 'di bstan cing bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun
25a6(mdo sde): khri bdun stong gis ni sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgo rjes su thob te/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de nyid do// de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag gis deng byang chub thob bo// 
25a7(mdo sde): bdag cag gis deng byang chub thob bo zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang smras so// srog chags byabye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das
25a8(mdo sde): kyis de dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// srog chags bye ba khrag khrigs ya phrag brgyad ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med
25b1(mdo sde): cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// dge slong sum stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad de/ bcom ldan
25b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzod nas kyang / de nas de ma thag tu de'i tshe 'jig rten du 'od chen po byung bar gyur cing / sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chos gos
25b3(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
25b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung ba dang / 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan
25b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems/ dpa' bra can gyi 'od kyis sgo'i tshig bstan cing bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong gis sgrib pa med pa
25b6(mdo sde): chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo thob par gyur cing / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis sgo'i tshig bstan pa de ni nam mkha' yongs su zin pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du sangs rgyas
25b7(mdo sde): brgyad stong las blangs te/ blangs nas kyang de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgos nges par byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
25b8(mdo sde): 'gro ba la mkhas par gyur pa'i phyir ro// yang de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa gcig pa na
26a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'khor/ 
26a2(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das de'i rgyal tshab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug
26a3(mdo sde): nas/ des gsung gsal ba'i sgra de thos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'od de yang mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
26a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gsung gsal ba'i sgra dang 'od gda' ba de su'i lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu
26a5(mdo sde): mchog gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon de la bka' stsal pa/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon nub phyogs su sangs rgyas
26a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
26a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ sems dpa' dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las brtsams nas/ byang chub
26a8(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// de nas de bzhin gash+ye
26b1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon gyis 'di skad ces gsol/ 
26b2(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / sems dpa' dpe med pa'i byang
26b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag blta ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dor bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
26b4(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchogagis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka'
26b5(mdo sde): sprul to// rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na/ rigs kyi bu khyod song la sangs rgyas kyi nong der shes bzhin du gnas par yang byos shig/ 
26b6(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skyes pa de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i
26b7(mdo sde): phyir ro// nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de
26b8(mdo sde): la lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di yang phul cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i
27a1(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bskor ba yang byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'ongs te
27a2(mdo sde): de 'ongs nas de ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad na/ me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de'i tshe de'i dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag dang
27a3(mdo sde): dus ma yin pa'i 'bras bu dag gtor to// me tog gi char ba yang bab bo// spos kyi char rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang bab po// rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang grag go
27a4(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod dakhyu mchog rnam par gnon/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
27a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ log pa gnyis gas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ba zung ngo // gdong gis kyang yongs su gtugs te/ tshig 'di
27a6(mdo sde): skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
27a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
27a8(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yang khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon bskur bsti byas pa dang / mchod pa dang / ri mo byas par
27b1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnonas las langs te/ spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
27b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung
27b3(mdo sde): ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma bskur ba lags na
27b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las bzhesu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
27b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don
27b6(mdo sde): yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la bka' stsal pa/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gnod pa chung ngam
27b7(mdo sde): nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' ngam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog de gnod pa chung zhing / stobs dang ldan la
27b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bde bar reg pa la gnas lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la
28a1(mdo sde): lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de blangs nas tshig gsol pa
28a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rigs kyi bu dang / rig kyi bu mo gang dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
28a3(mdo sde): dag par gyur cig/ sems can yongs su smin par gyur cig/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can yongasu ma smin pa rnams la chos bstan pa dang / sems can
28a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du rnams dang / dman pa la mos pa rnams la chos ston dka' ba'i slad du ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na
28a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di las 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed mthong bar 'tshal ba de snyed kyang ma thong ba dang / lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di nyid las bcom
28a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phung po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de yang mthong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na
28a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang mthong ba dang / de nas gang nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa phal cher rig pa gsum dang ldan pa dang / rig pa drug
