80b8(mdo sde): dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces kyang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi stobs bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs
81a1(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am/ lag pa brkyang bskum
81a2(mdo sde): par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam des song ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go/ de rgyal po'i khab 'od mo'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba
81a3(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang // 
81a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das pa com ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal
81a5(mdo sde): gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yangangam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyan gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bcom
81a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das des lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal 'di yang bskur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal bzhes te/ bzhes
81a7(mdo sde): nas kyang bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ bde bar gnas sam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol ba
81a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri bzhi stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos brtsegs ces bya ba yod de/ 
81b1(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
81b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med kyis snang
81b3(mdo sde): ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
81b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das snang ba de dang / gsung gsal ba'i sgra gra dag pa de su'i lags bcom ldan 'das des dbaka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char
81b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri bzhi stong 'das/ pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
81b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim pa
81b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan
81b8(mdo sde): 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyi lag par tsan dan gyi thu bo byin
82a1(mdo sde): te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la tsan dan gyi thum po 'di phul la/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa can
82a2(mdo sde): dan gyi bsung gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ snyun gsol lo zhes kyang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems/ 
82a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bskor ba byas nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis
82a4(mdo sde): lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am/ brkyang ba skum dbar byed pa'i skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam des/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug
82a5(mdo sde): go/ der rgyal po'i khab 'od mo'i tshal bya ka lan da ka ga na sa pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
82a6(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi gsung
82a7(mdo sde): gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das des tsan dan gyi
82a8(mdo sde): thum bu 'di yang bskur ba lags na/ tsan dan gyi thum po 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhesu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
82b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dri ma med la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sam
82b2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' zhing stobs dang ldan la/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/ bde bar gnas lagaso// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri
82b3(mdo sde): sum stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri 'das ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mig btud ces bya ba bzhugs te
82b4(mdo sde): 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de das byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod ces bya ba bla nam dad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// 
82b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phan 'dod kyi sa/ snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
82b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po phan 'dod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mig btud de ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od de
82b7(mdo sde): dang / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa to// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas
82b8(mdo sde): kyi zhing grangs med pa sum khre sum stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
83a1(mdo sde): rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par
83a2(mdo sde): byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang
83a3(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ 
83a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa mig btud da kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod kyi lag par pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po mngon par 'phags pa gcig byin
83a5(mdo sde): te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la pad+ma'i rgyal po 'di phul la/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'ad sa bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa mig btud
83a6(mdo sde): gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces kyang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems
83a7(mdo sde): dpa' phan 'dod bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/ lag pa brkyang
83a8(mdo sde): bskum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thang gcig dang yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go// de rgyal po'i khab 'od
83b1(mdo sde): ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
83b2(mdo sde): 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin
83b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa mig btud gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bcom
83b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po 'di yang bskur ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod la bka' stsal/ 
83b5(mdo sde): pa/ phan 'dod ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lag so// de'i tshe
83b6(mdo sde): shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa sum khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen mtha' yas brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
83b7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
83b8(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung gnas des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
84a1(mdo sde): tu lung bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla na med snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po de yang thos so// de nas
84a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'dad bka' stsal
84a3(mdo sde): pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa sum khri nyid stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na
84a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i nga sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
84a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim pa/ ra byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang / ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
84a6(mdo sde): pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
84a7(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bskur bgyi ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang blta ba'i
84a8(mdo sde): slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag 'chi bar bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes nani song shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sem/ 
84b1(mdo sde): dpa' ye shes bla ma'i lag par me tog kha dog lnga pa snyim pa gang byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la me tog kha dog lnga pa glang 'di phul la/ bcom ldan 'das bcom
84b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar rig pa la gnas sam/ snyun gsol lo
84b3(mdo sde): zhes de skad ces kyang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang
84b4(mdo sde): ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/ lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / tha cig dang / yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi
84b5(mdo sde): snang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
84b6(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin/ 
84b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas gnod pa chung ngam nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das/ 
84b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des me tog kha dog lnga pa snyim pa gang 'di bskur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhesu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang bka'
85a1(mdo sde): stsal pa/ ye shes bla ma ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan
85a2(mdo sde): 'das de lta lags so// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
85a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
85a4(mdo sde): dpa' rin chen glang po che zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen glang po ches snang
85a5(mdo sde): ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos// de nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin/ nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la zhus pa/ mthu de su'i lags/ 
85a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das des de la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'odi nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa/ 
85a7(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
85a8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems pa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta log so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin
85b1(mdo sde): du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
85b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tshogs
85b3(mdo sde): can zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// zhes bya ba nas de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbar ro// de'i tshe
85b4(mdo sde): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri danyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshe dgas rgyal mtshon zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
85b5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhu na po'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing ga zhes la chos kyang ston to/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
85b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nges 'dren ces bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// zhes bya ba nas de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar
85b7(mdo sde): du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin ga sh+ye
85b8(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa'
86a1(mdo sde): rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang
86a2(mdo sde): de lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang zhes bya ba yod de/ 
86a3(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa med pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
86a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes khyu mchog ces bya ba bla na/ da med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta
86a5(mdo sde): logs so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
86a6(mdo sde): bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'
86a7(mdo sde): ye shes lhun len pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du
86a8(mdo sde): sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa nyi khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
86b1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpung mgo zlum pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' khyad par
86b2(mdo sde): blo gros ces bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin
86b3(mdo sde): du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa su khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
86b4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dra ba can dgyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la tshe ngas kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
86b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba/ bla na medapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// zhes bya ba nas de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag
86b6(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri tshig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de
86b7(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ud pa la dmar po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang stan te/ bcom ldan
86b8(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma mngon 'phags dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / 
87a1(mdo sde): de ltar lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu
87a2(mdo sde): zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes me tog rin po che'i 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
87a3(mdo sde): chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi bkod pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang
87a4(mdo sde): 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de ltar lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sumo khri chig stong 'das
87a5(mdo sde): pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba 'phags pa'i 'od zer
87a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin po tshe'i 'od zer ces bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
87a7(mdo sde): paba'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi kham
87a8(mdo sde): grangs med pa sum khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs pa dang / 
87b1(mdo sde): bag tsha ba thams cad rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba bla na
87b2(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig
87b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
87b4(mdo sde): lhun po'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la tshe ngas kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem sa dpa' phung po shin tu bshig pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa
87b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar
87b6(mdo sde): phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang gnod pa thams cad las rgal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
87b7(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' tshang ba'i dbyangs
87b8(mdo sde): kyi nga ro zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du
88a1(mdo sde): sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
88a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes 'byung gnas shes bya ba bla
88a3(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten
88a4(mdo sde): gyi khams nye khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi kha/ mos shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bcu las 'phros pa'i 'od zer zhes pa bzhugs
88a5(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom lnga na 'das des kyang byang chub sems dpa' bcu las 'phros pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
88a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri
88a7(mdo sde): brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu bla ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
88a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang
88b1(mdo sde): de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spos shes bya ba yod
88b2(mdo sde): de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' mig bzang zhes bya ba/ bla na
88b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su
88b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med nyi khri bdun stong 'das pa don/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi ngad ldan zhes bya ba yod/ de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon 'bogs shes
88b5(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
88b6(mdo sde): chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri
88b7(mdo sde): bdun stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams lam snang dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
88b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba
89a1(mdo sde): dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri drug stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
89a2(mdo sde): bzang po mchog gi dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
89a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags
89a4(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe sha daphyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos bzangs shes bya
89a5(mdo sde): ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang / ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
89a6(mdo sde): khyu mchog ces bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du
89a7(mdo sde): sbyor ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri bzhi stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha'
89a8(mdo sde): yis shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi bsung zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
89b1(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// bam po drug pa// de'i tshe shar phyogs
89b2(mdo sde): su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri sum stong 'das pa no// 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dge pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mtha' yas shes bya ba
89b3(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i bkod pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
89b4(mdo sde): bstan te zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
89b5(mdo sde): med pa nyi khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
89b6(mdo sde): bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang
89b7(mdo sde): 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de ltar lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri chog stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
89b8(mdo sde): byang chub yan lag rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ut+pa li'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
90a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' pad+ma dpal zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags
90a2(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
90a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa ye shes rab gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen rab rdzogs shes bya ba/ bla na med pa
90a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya/ dab nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe
90a5(mdo sde): shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes kyi/ stobs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
90a6(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen thub pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
90a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
90a8(mdo sde): khams grangs med pa khri brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogasu rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba
90b1(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho nang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgrags pa mtha' yas shes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
90b2(mdo sde): bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med gi rje bdun
90b3(mdo sde): stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pas la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
90b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' das la rin po che zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas
90b5(mdo sde): de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so/ zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri drug ste/ 
90b6(mdo sde): 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa la rin po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
90b7(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sbas shes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta
90b8(mdo sde): lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod ces bya ba yod de
91a1(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo bsgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' shing / 
91a2(mdo sde): bzang po can zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du
91a3(mdo sde): sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri bo ni stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
91a4(mdo sde): rta zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kya dang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems/ dpa' rgyu skar gyi rta zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag
91a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig
91a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri sum stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brjod pa don yod ces bya ba bzhugs// 
91a7(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' don yod ming rgal zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ 
91a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa khri nyis stong 'das pa
91b1(mdo sde): na'ajig rten gyi khams mya ngan bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
91b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dpal mtha' yas gzi brjid ces bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so// 
91b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri tshig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdom pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
91b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhug/ sa te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom da ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' dpas byin zhes bya
91b5(mdo sde): pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba stan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// 
91b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba don yod ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod rnam par gnon zhes/ 
91b7(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' don yod pa'i go cha bgos shes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
91b8(mdo sde): tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa dgu stong
92a1(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
92a2(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snang zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang
92a3(mdo sde): de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dbyangs kying ro/ 
92a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med dpa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'dra
92a5(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' tha mi dad pa'i go cha zhes bya ba/ bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes
92a6(mdo sde): bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
92a7(mdo sde): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
92a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang
92b1(mdo sde): 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
92b2(mdo sde): gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mo mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
92b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs shes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya
92b4(mdo sde): ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi kham das grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na
92b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ma/ dad/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
92b6(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba
92b7(mdo sde): nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs mod pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa ni
92b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams chos shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
93a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' ud pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de
93a2(mdo sde): lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shor phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma mngon par 'phags
93a3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
93a4(mdo sde): dpa' grags sbyin zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo/ gas pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nasade yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes
93a5(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyog sa su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i snying po zhes
93a6(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po
93a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// 
93a8(mdo sde): de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su rnam par
93b1(mdo sde): bsgrags pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa'i go cha zhes bya ba/ bla na
93b2(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar
93b3(mdo sde): phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bdun stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shes 'phags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sbas pa'i bdag po sprin
93b4(mdo sde): gyi dbang phyug mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bla
93b5(mdo sde): na med pa seng dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to na/ sa bya ba nas de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag sa so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// 
93b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa drug stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu shin tu smras shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha'
93b7(mdo sde): yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' snang ba chen po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
93b8(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bye ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams
94a1(mdo sde): grangs med pa lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mar me byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi ye shes mtha' yas 'byung gnas shes bya ba
94a2(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po snang zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
94a3(mdo sde): lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma byed
94a4(mdo sde): ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhi/ dang gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des
94a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de sgron ma byed
94a6(mdo sde): ces bya bar bstan ce na/ 'jig rten gyi khams do na ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa'i rdzing rgya che zhing yangs pa/ grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yod de/ pad+ma
94a7(mdo sde): de dag kyang 'dab ma stong pa chu mngon par brtol nas gyen du dpag tshad brgyad bcur 'phags pa ste/ pad+ma re re las kyang 'od zer 'bum 'byung bar byed cing / gyen du dang thur du yang 'od
94a8(mdo sde): zer stong 'byung bar byed la/ de bzhin du phyogs thams cad du yang 'od zer stong stong 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de yang mig mangs ri su bris pa rin po che'i 'phreng
94b1(mdo sde): bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i skud pas brgyan pa/ mig mangs ris thams cad du yang / rin po che las byas pa'i shing ljon pa dag skyes par gyur pa/ gyen du dpag tshad bdun khri bdun
94b2(mdo sde): stong mngon par 'phags pa/ thad kar ni dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma rab tu song ba'o// rin po che'i shing re re las kyang nor bu bye ba phrag
94b3(mdo sde): brgyad cu zo ba tsam dag rab tu 'phyang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na shing ljon pa de dag kyang grangs med dpag tu med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma de dag dang / nor bu de dag gi
94b4(mdo sde): 'od kyis rtag tu snang bar byas pa ste/ 'od de yang bcom ldan 'das de'i 'od kyis mog mog por byas pa'o//  chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha chen po de mthong
94b5(mdo sde): ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go chas zhus
94b6(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das 'od dang gsung gsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des de la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams
94b7(mdo sde): grangs med pa lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes
94b8(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/ mthu de lta bu de ni de'i yin no// gsol pa
95a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur brdzi ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
95a2(mdo sde): mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha'i lag par pad+ma chen po gcig byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan
95a3(mdo sde): 'das de la 'di phul la/ nga'i tshig gis de bzhin du gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la
95a4(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar bye du pa'am/ lag pa brkyang ba bskums par byed pa'i skad
95a5(mdo sde): cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam des 'jigarten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'jig/ rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go/ de bcom
95a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das des de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
95a7(mdo sde): la gnod pa chung ngam nyam nga ba nyum ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa snyun gsol
95a8(mdo sde): zhing / bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma chen po 'di yang bcom ldan 'das des bskur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes su gsol// bcom ldan
95b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am
95b2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
95b3(mdo sde): pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan sa ya na zhes bya ba chos kyi skyes byin
95b4(mdo sde): nas btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i mdab chag ngas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogasu rnam par bsgrags/ shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas
95b5(mdo sde): me tog tshogs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod rnam par gnon ces bya
95b6(mdo sde): ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje yang dag gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po/ 
95b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
95b8(mdo sde): mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi phug ces bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i lus shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
96a1(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu bltas paring ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten
96a2(mdo sde): gyi khams rtsi lta bu zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
96a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod go cha bgos shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sman 'phags shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
96a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas brtson 'grus go che zhes/ bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos/ kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
96a5(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab yang dag par byin pa'i bslab pa blangs zhes bye ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'ji ga rten gyi khams kun nas brgyan ces bya ba yod de
96a6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyan mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
96a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na pad+ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de
96a8(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa co kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin
96b1(mdo sde): po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs/ 
96b2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab
96b3(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
96b4(mdo sde): gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan/ thams cad rab gnas shes bya ba 'dang ngo // de'i la
96b5(mdo sde): mda' chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon te/ na mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ dran de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya
96b6(mdo sde): babazhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan mtha' yas bsgrags
96b7(mdo sde): shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs su rab grags shes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me
96b8(mdo sde): mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyod pa thams cad 'gyur zhes
97a1(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams lhas brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po zhes bya
97a2(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
97a3(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shing thags bzang po can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
97a4(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub se/ dmas dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya/ dab btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten
97a5(mdo sde): gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshe gas pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
97a6(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab srid pa sel ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
97a7(mdo sde): b+ha gi ra so'i sras shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba mi 'jigs thob ces bya ba btang ngo // 
97a8(mdo sde): de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
97b1(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab bag cha ba med pa zhes bya babang ngo // de'i yang mad ba chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod na
97b2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mchog gi 'odi zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang bston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha lag na ye shes
97b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te
97b4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldangan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yul na/ mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda'
97b5(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen 'phags shes/ bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing / 
97b6(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
97b7(mdo sde): khams zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
97b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog rab gtor zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdag chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rang
98a1(mdo sde): gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na bzhin gshegs pa yon tanamatha' las rgyal po ba gnas shes bya ba bcugs te/ 'tshan gnas la tsham kyang stan te/ @
98a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de
98a3(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtsi'i rgyal po
98a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na// 'dzi/ dag rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
98a5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba khyad par blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab
98a6(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
98a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
98a8(mdo sde): debazhin gshegs pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mas byin zhes bya
98b1(mdo sde): ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
98b2(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag par brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi/ 
98b3(mdo sde): khams yon tan thams cad rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te
98b4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de das byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu sbas shes bya dab btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
98b5(mdo sde): khams rin chen snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/  zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des
98b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun gyis brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de
98b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa' sman ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i
98b8(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub yan lag brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te
99a1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' legs par bsam pa khyad par blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
99a2(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i blo gros shes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
99a3(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba khyad par byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
99a4(mdo sde): sprin ces bya ba yod de/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yus rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
99a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab dran pa rnyed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me to// ga dra bas kun tu g.yogs shes bya ba yod de
99a6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad mos pa'i go cha bgos shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
99a7(mdo sde): dpa' khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs
99a8(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i
99b1(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
99b2(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyu mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas spos zhes bya ba yod de
99b3(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos kyi glang po che
99b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshe gas po rin chen khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te
99b5(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan bral zhes bya/ ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig
99b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rin chen sna tshogs rgyal tsha ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
99b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba mtha' yas sbyar zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du bgod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
99b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
100a1(mdo sde): rgyal tshab phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
100a2(mdo sde): pa phyogs su rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam par bsgrags
100a3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ka ling ka'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
100a4(mdo sde): zhing gzhos la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal che ba khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten
100a5(mdo sde): gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshe gas pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhug/ sa te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
100a6(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zla ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
100a7(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab
100a8(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
100b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu bde ba zhes bya ba yod de
100b2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po rab gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi
100b3(mdo sde): 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med
100b4(mdo sde): pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs shes bya ba btango // de'i yang
100b5(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhe/ sa bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
100b6(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin ga
100b7(mdo sde): ba ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab stobs brtan zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
100b8(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
101a1(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtho ba'i rgyal
101a2(mdo sde): mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyu dag
101a3(mdo sde): pab zhes bya ba btang po/ de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
101a4(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yadra mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya
101a5(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kya/ nga ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
101a6(mdo sde): rgyal tshab sa bon 'chang zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje bzhed ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
101a7(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri med rnam par 'thor zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
101a8(mdo sde): thams cad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
101b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab bkod pa du ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang gnod pa thams cad yongs su spangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
101b2(mdo sde): pa phan bzhed ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab glang po che'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab
101b3(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas yongs rdzogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yang brtags pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
101b4(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des bya nga chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi bkod pa zhesabya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten
101b5(mdo sde): gyi khams mnyam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
101b6(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
101b7(mdo sde): pa ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu brtson zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
101b8(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba yod da/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
102a1(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston/ te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zla ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
102a2(mdo sde): bstan te btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtags tu snang bar byas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas pa'i lhun po spos kyi rgyal
102a3(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na ye shes zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags
102a4(mdo sde): na'ajig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ra ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
102a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pa/ dud rtsi'i dbyangs shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang ma dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs dkar
102a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
102a7(mdo sde): brtson pa mi gtong zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa dang / bud med 'gyur bar
102a8(mdo sde): mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nga ro mtha' yas shes bya ba bting ngo // de'i yang mdab chags
102b1(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
102b2(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na spos shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gash+ye
102b3(mdo sde): pa rin chen mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba 'od zer du
102b4(mdo sde): ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'ji dag rten gyi khams kun tu spos shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon par 'phags
102b5(mdo sde): pa rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang / chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin po lhun po zhes bya ba
102b6(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kun gyi sems kyi mos po'i ye shes mthong ba
102b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhi gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'dra de byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba ded dpon chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig
102b8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
103a1(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos thams cad dben par gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas me tog
103a2(mdo sde): brgyan ces bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sbas pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
103a3(mdo sde): rgyal tshab ye shes 'od zer zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs kyi
103a4(mdo sde): nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'o nga rgyal tshab mig bzangs shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
103a5(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo rnam par/ gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang / 
103a6(mdo sde): ston te ta bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba legs pa'i blo zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
103a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skar mi'i sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // 
103a8(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun gyi khyu mchog ston ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la
103b1(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rna ba'i me tog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bden pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 
103b2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa don grub ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba/ 
103b3(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba yod da/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i dpal zhes pa bya bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
103b4(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem das dpa' rgyal tshab kun dga' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gnod
103b5(mdo sde): pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ na pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
103b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
103b7(mdo sde): thams cad yod pas rgyags pa yang dag bcom zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyal po'i
103b8(mdo sde): khyu mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 
104a1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog kun tu bltas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig
104a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
104a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rnam par 'byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
104a4(mdo sde): bdud rtsi'i rtog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes nga la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen rtog ces bya ba btang ngo // 
104a5(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi kham/ sa 'jigs med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin ga shegs pa tsan dan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes
104a6(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dra ba can zhes bya ba yod de
104a7(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od gsal zhes bya ba bta// 
104a8(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs
104b1(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na
104b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bgrod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
104b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba bdud rtsi'i dbyangs shes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dmigs pa med ces
104b4(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun de la dgyes par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing ga/ zhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
104b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu bsgrags shes
104b6(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
104b7(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu bzed ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs/ 
104b8(mdo sde): pa rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas she bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spobs pa mi chos pa zhes bya ba
105a1(mdo sde): btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mthong zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad
105a2(mdo sde): gzigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshob mtshan ma med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten
105a3(mdo sde): gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu blta zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad gzigs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
105a4(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba rnam par dag pa'i mig ces bya ba btang ngo //  // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig
105a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung nga zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
105a6(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul
105a7(mdo sde): bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems/ 
105a8(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal chab 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa las rab tu khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
105b1(mdo sde): pa pad+ma'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ut+pal dmar po'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig
105b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mas rab tu khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ do na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogasu 'phags shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
105b3(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gis rab tu
105b4(mdo sde): khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes ngal chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
105b5(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab yid gnyis thams cad yang dag bcom zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rte/ na gyi khams mar me zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin ga
105b6(mdo sde): pa sems can gyi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
105b7(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
105b8(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
106a1(mdo sde): ye shes kyi me zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi nor bu can
106a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngal med ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
106a3(mdo sde): ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nges 'dren ces bya ba yod de/ de na
106a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sman pa'i mchog ces bya ba btang / 
106a5(mdo sde): ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kha/ dog med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa/ tha dad pa med pa'i go che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhu/ 
106a6(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tha mi dad par spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu kha dog ces bya
106a7(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas grags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yin/ 
106a8(mdo sde): tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang mdab chags na
106b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mtsho can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi gsung gi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
106b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'a'i rgyal tshab ye shes spos kyi dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpe med dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
106b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dpe med me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yang dag 'phags shes
106b4(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
106b5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshad sdom pa la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang
106b6(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'phags pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gau zhes la chos kyang ston te// 
106b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal tshab zla ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // // bam po bdun pa// de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
106b8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan
107a1(mdo sde): med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lus
107a2(mdo sde): mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brag ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig
