107a3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dga' ji spos shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyo med 'gyur bar mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
107a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yongs sgrags nyon mongs yang dge bcom zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun la
107a5(mdo sde): rab tu gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs ba snyan pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
107a6(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyaro// 
107a7(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa kun la rab tu gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe
107a8(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
107b1(mdo sde): mya ngan med pa'i blo gros shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
107b2(mdo sde): rin chen me zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig
107b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
107b4(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' me tog rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu bkram zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin ga
107b5(mdo sde): pa me tog rab tu gtor ba'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan la/ des des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos kyi dpal
107b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos kyi 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te
107b7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nges 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na
107b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan btud ces bya ba btugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
108a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
108a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'od gtang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbyin bsreg byas pa'i 'od ces bya ba btang ngo // 
108a3(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
108a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na// 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba yod de
108a5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang zhes bya ba bzhugs/ te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba rin chen
108a6(mdo sde): byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu bdug spos bdugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gnyis gtsug tor
108a7(mdo sde): can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gnyis 'od ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
108a8(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
108b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab srid pa
108b2(mdo sde): gsum zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs/ 
108b3(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten rgya
108b4(mdo sde): khams rtag tu dmigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhi na gshegs pa na mkha'i rigs kyi khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
108b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag pa ca na zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
108b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa zad mi shes pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
108b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas des/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin
108b8(mdo sde): du sbyar ro// de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu yongasu spangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
109a1(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab spos rab gtong zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
109a2(mdo sde): bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' yul
109a3(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra rnam par sgrags shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bsgrags
109a4(mdo sde): shes bya ba zhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
109a5(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma'i dkyil 'a/ khor zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa/ shin tu rab tu gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
109a6(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pa rA dzA na zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig
109a7(mdo sde): pab zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' blo
109a8(mdo sde): gros dpe med ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dga' byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun gyi 'byung
109b1(mdo sde): gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // 
109b2(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
109b3(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
109b4(mdo sde): rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs dpa ye shes 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
109b5(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mabasgrogs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyi phreng ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 
109b6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i 'od kyis gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
109b7(mdo sde): tsha ba lags byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te
109b8(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sangs rgyas chos 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
110a1(mdo sde): me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
110a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes dpal ba 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ku mu das rab tu khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
110a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa zla ba tog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba ri rab byin tekhya ba btang ngo // 
110a4(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams langs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos
110a5(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dang / 'a rgyal tshab mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces
110a6(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bdud rtsi'i
110a7(mdo sde): sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma brtsegs pa zhes bya ba zhugs te/ mtsho zhing gzhes la
110a8(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can
110b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyi
110b2(mdo sde): bos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsam pa ka dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te
110b3(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen
110b4(mdo sde): snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brtsegs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing ga zhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
110b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma dzangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzangs
110b6(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang bston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab sangs rgyas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags
110b7(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa med mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
110b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha'
111a1(mdo sde): yas 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas
111a2(mdo sde): shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi rtog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang // 
111a3(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu 'od ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i spos shes bya ba yod de/ de na
111a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
111a5(mdo sde): yon tan 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chag/ sa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blta na sdug ces bya ba yo// da de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ldan thams cad
111a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhos la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten
111a7(mdo sde): gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
111a8(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbyin mos shes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas kun tu kha
111b1(mdo sde): shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sngar 'chums
111b2(mdo sde): ma yin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas kun tu khebs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'phags pa'i dpal zhes
111b3(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grong khyer sgrogs shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na
111b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
111b5(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi khom thams cad 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs
111b6(mdo sde): gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
111b7(mdo sde): tsha ba rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha'i rigs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas shes bya
111b8(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin tshon lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten
112a1(mdo sde): gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i rna cha gdug 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
112a2(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi kha
112a3(mdo sde): mngon du 'gros pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
112a4(mdo sde): rgyal tshab mya ngan med ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos rigs btsunate/ ngas bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i
112a5(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos/ kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chubs/ mas dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang
112a6(mdo sde): ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 
112a7(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs btsun zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba
112a8(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog sna tshogs me tog kun tu rgyas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
112b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mthu dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
112b2(mdo sde): mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pa lang bdag ces bya ba btang ngo // 
112b3(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na'ajig rten gyi khams rin chen me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul bral rnam par grol ba'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te
112b4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das da des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten
112b5(mdo sde): gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog ces bya ba bzhu gas te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
112b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par snang byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod
112b7(mdo sde): de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khang pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab
112b8(mdo sde): gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs/ 
113a1(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig
113a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams grol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
113a3(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab byams pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rab gtor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung zhes bya ba
113a4(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bco dam ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog gi gdugs me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // 
113a5(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me togacan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gdugs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes
113a6(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gser gdugs shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes
113a7(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab log pa'i
113a8(mdo sde): go cha bgos shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs
113b1(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skyed byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na
113b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
113b3(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyaro// 
113b4(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog gi rgya dal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegangs pa khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
113b5(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem sa dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog
113b6(mdo sde): ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
113b7(mdo sde): rigs mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gsor zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs
113b8(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
114a1(mdo sde): rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
114a2(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab 'das pa rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de
114a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'gro kun rnam par 'joms mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs to// 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang
114a4(mdo sde): dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' da chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis
114a5(mdo sde): yang dag 'joms par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ tshozhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'a ngas des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mthong ma thag tu
114a6(mdo sde): nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'ing ro zhes bya ba
114a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par bltas pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na
114a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
114b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gom pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen rab gnas shes bya
114b2(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdo rje
114b3(mdo sde): rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khasas sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes
114b4(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me tog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags
114b5(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog ces bya ba ba/ zhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
114b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal cha ba tshangs mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams legs 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
114b7(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i go cha thogs pa med ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
114b8(mdo sde): rgyal tshab rdul bral sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba
115a1(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu gnon ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda'
115a2(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
115a3(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
115a4(mdo sde): pa nyi ma sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem ngas dpa' rgyal tshab nyi ma sgron ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal
115a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig/ rten gyi khams tshon rtsi phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya
115a6(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri med 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags
115a7(mdo sde): na'ajig rten gyi khams skar mda' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhos la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'dra
115a8(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'phel ba'i blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
115b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa gong na med pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas shes
115b2(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la
115b3(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnga sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod
115b4(mdo sde): de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas zhes bya/ dab bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshang
115b5(mdo sde): ba'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te// 
115b6(mdo sde): 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs snang zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa la zhes bya
115b7(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thu bo zhes bya
115b8(mdo sde): ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
116a1(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs shes
116a2(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa zhes bya/ 
116a3(mdo sde): ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang
116a4(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba sprin ci bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na / 'jig rten gyi khams kun 'dzin zhes bya ba yod de/ de
116a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'ad sa des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtsi'i rgyal po zhes
116a6(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
116a7(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu
116a8(mdo sde): rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yos pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
116b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab phug sbas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs
116b2(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi kham
116b3(mdo sde): spos dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
116b4(mdo sde): rgyal tsha ba pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdang da chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan khang
116b5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'chi zhing gzhes la chos kyang sto/ na te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'// rgyal tshab dpal sbas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
116b6(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la
116b7(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshob blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya/ 
116b8(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'jigs byed me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
117a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbyangs mtha' yas nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed ces bya ba yod de
117a2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dra ba can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba
117a3(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
117a4(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub se dmas dpa' rgyal tshab brjed med nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // / de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams can
117a5(mdo sde): dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
117a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'byor pas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba thams
117a7(mdo sde): cad nye bar sgrub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba phan 'dod ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab
117a8(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad ston ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
117b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
117b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa yongs bsgrags don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab go cha mtha' yas shes bya ba btang / 
117b3(mdo sde): ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
117b4(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba gtsug na nor bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes
117b5(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' ya sa bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho gang ga/ zhes la chos kyang ston te/ btsa ldan 'das des byang chub pa dang rgyal tshab thogs
117b6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i snying stobs go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba bkod
117b7(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen tog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na
117b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang/ 
118a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab na mkha' rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang byed ces bya ba yod de
118a2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab bzang po dbyangs shes
118a3(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mar me byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho nang
118a4(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byachub sems dpa' rgyal chab khyu mchog ces bya ba ba dating ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
118a5(mdo sde): khams me tog dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
118a6(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg
118a7(mdo sde): pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
118a8(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad tshegs mtha' yas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe
118b1(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshad med blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga'
118b2(mdo sde): 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pas ma pham pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
118b3(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab phas ma pham pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon rtogs ce bya ba bzhugs te/ 
118b4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhe das bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
118b5(mdo sde): khams spos 'das shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin ga/ shegs pa lhun po mtha' yas mu med spos shes bya/ ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
118b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
118b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma 'chang zhes
118b8(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ldan pa mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
119a1(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de
119a2(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtul bas byin zhes bya ba
119a3(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ btso
119a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po nga zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
119a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan/ 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mdzes pa chen
119a6(mdo sde): po'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
119a7(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chub tshangs pa'ing ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i
119a8(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
119b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab dbang pos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas
119b2(mdo sde): 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags
119b3(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
119b4(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes bsags shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na
119b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa legs par bsam pa'i smon lam yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
119b6(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
119b7(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba
119b8(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes spos shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
120a1(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na// 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa zhes bya
120a2(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khang pa sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam par sem
120a3(mdo sde): shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes spos shes bya ba yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
120a4(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab ye shes 'byung gan/ des shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig
120a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
120a6(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab phyogs su rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
120a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa bde bdag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
120a8(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grags dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
120b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi mjed kyi bdag po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes
120b2(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal// 
120b3(mdo sde): che ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bas
120b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes
120b5(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rte/ na gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te
120b6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams so sor
120b7(mdo sde): bag yangs shes bya ba yod de/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtser 'jug rtsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhags te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
120b8(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu rtsams pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu so sor yang dag gnas shes bya ba yod de
121a1(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer pad+ma sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
121a2(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
121a3(mdo sde): yon tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad kyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
121a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ku don tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snyi dang stobs kyi go cha bgos shes bya ba/ bla na med pa
121a5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bya nga chub sems dpa' des snang ba chen po des thong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// thos nas kyang
121a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung gsal ba'i sgra 'di su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
121a7(mdo sde): nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
121a8(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/ mthu de lta bu 'di ni de'i yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das
121b1(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
121b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bskur bgyi ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// 
121b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
121b4(mdo sde): snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis/ pad+ma brgyad blangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang / ba com ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu gtor to// de nas
121b5(mdo sde): pad+ma de dag 'jig rten gyi bar dag las 'das nas/ rgyal po'i kha kha 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der so sor yang dag par
121b6(mdo sde): 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor bzhi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis de dag mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
121b7(mdo sde): pad+ma de dag gis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas pad+ma de dag la reg par mdzad nas/ reg pa tsam gyis pad+ma de dag las
121b8(mdo sde): kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dag mngon par byung ngo // byung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas mi snang bar gyur to// / bam po brgyan
122a1(mdo sde): pa// mtha' yas mkhyen mnga' gang zag khyu mchog gtso// rang byung mtha' yas chos rnams thug su chud// khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mtha' las rgya chen gda'// 'jig rten kha
122a2(mdo sde): rnams kun tu snang bar mdzad/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas// zhu ba'i khyad par kun tu zhu ba dang // sangs rgyas blta dang phyag kyang bgyi slad du// mkhas pa de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs
122a3(mdo sde): kyis mchis// byang chub go bgos dpa' bo gang mchis dag/ mi mjed 'jig rten khams su rab gnas pa// de dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ de dag ming dang gzugs dang grags
122a4(mdo sde): pas 'phags// de dag go cha'i dngos pos mi 'jig sa shing // sems can sman pa'i slad du yang dag zhugs // byang chub mchog la ji ltar reg 'gyur ba// 'jig rten rnam
122a5(mdo sde): 'dren mchog la de dag zhu// ci'i slad mngon du cho sa tshol bgyid ce na// bdud rnams gzhom dang byang chub 'thob slad du// de nas zhu ba zhu ba'i sprul pa rnams// 
122a6(mdo sde): gang yin de la shAkya thub pas gsungs// 'dren pas yang dag tshig gis de bstan nas// mo mchog de yis tshig rnams thos gyur te/ dga' zhing mgu la rje su yi reng nas// bde gshegs
122a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal de dge 'khod par gyur// sprul pa de dag der ni mi snang nas/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs la zhu ba zhu// de dag gang nas mchis shing ming ce zhes// de tshe 'khor kyang spurnam
122a8(mdo sde): ring zhes byed// 'khor rnams ban pa de dag gus pa yis// rgyal ba la ni zhu bar mi spro ste// de tshe 'jig rten megan po'i sprul pa sprul// de tshe dge slong kun dga' babang po byung // mgon paT/ 
122b1(mdo sde): ba 'di zhu de dag gang // zhus nas kyang ni mi gda' ma mthong gyur// de dag su lags de dag su yi lags// mgon po bshad cing the tsom bsal du gsol// smon lam dpa' bo ldan pa'i go cha
122b2(mdo sde): ltos// de yis byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir lhags te// shar phyogs kyi ni 'jig rten khams kyi tshul// grangs med dag nas de dag lhags pa yin// dpa' bo 'jig rten phan phyir gang lhags
122b3(mdo sde): pa// rnam par bltas nas dong bar gyur pa ste// bsam pa dag pa byang chub phyir spyod pa// de'i smon lam de ni de 'dra'o// de dag dge bas nges par sangs rgyas mthong // de dag 'dir ni de la sgyid mi
122b4(mdo sde): lug/ tshul khrims kyis kyang dman par mi 'gyur// te// thos pa mang zhing pha rol phyin pas 'phags// de dag thabs shes pa la shin tu bslabs// mngal gyi gnasu 'gro
122b5(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur te// 'khor ba'i tshe na tshe rabs cha rab su// de dag chos kyi sems rgyud brjed mi 'gyur/ rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon du 'phrad// rtag tu 'phags pa
122b6(mdo sde): rnams dang 'grogs par 'gyur// dpa' bo de yis sems can 'dir mthong rnams// rtag tu de la rab tu 'byung ba 'thob// mthong ma thag tu dge bas de 'dra ste/ gang dag gzhan ma brjod pa de dag
122b7(mdo sde): mang // dpa' bo de'i yon tan gang yod pa// mang du bsgrags kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba med// dpa' bo shin tu gnas pa de yi ming // de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa// de ni phyin chad bud med
122b8(mdo sde): dngos mi 'gyur// sems can dam pa'i mchog tu de 'gyur ro// skyes pa bud med gang gis ming thos shing // thos nas de la'ang dga' ba skyed byed la// sangs rgyas zhing der smon lam 'debs byed
123a1(mdo sde): pa// lus zhig nas ni der yang skye bar 'gyur// zhing yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba yin// skyes pa bud med 'on te gzhan yang rung // gang gis ming thos nam zhig dang byed pa// thams
123a2(mdo sde): cad byang chub ched las nyams mi 'gyur// gang dag gcer bu'i sems can ma gtogs par// thos nas su zhig dga' ba skye mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyis kyang de ni yong ma gsungs// 'on kyang de// 
123a3(mdo sde): dag dge dang ldan par 'gyur// gang dag bsam pas ming yang thos pa ni// ji ltar rtsi yis skyon rnams sel byed bzhin// sems can de dag gis ni der mthong ba// byang chub don tu nges 'gyur the
123a4(mdo sde): tsam med// gang zhig pa la sha'i 'dab thogs shing // de dang der ni rtsi dag byed gyur na/ de tshe kun nas sman dgyi stobs kyis su// sus kyang der ni mi la tshig mi 'gyur// 
123a5(mdo sde): gang tshe sbrul gdug gzi brjid drag po yis// dug gang de/ dag mi gdug byed 'gyur te// sa'i steng na kun tu ston byed na// de 'dra'i sman brkos pas ni ci zhig bya// sprul
123a6(mdo sde): gdug dri ni gang dag snom byed pa// sbrul de thams cad 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur// de ltar rtsi sman 'dra ba'i mi de ni// ming gis sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur// de'i tshe phyogs bcu dag/ 
123a7(mdo sde): tu bsgrags pa na// dpa' bo de yi ming na sus thos pa// de'i ming gis las ni 'di byed de// bud med gang zag la ni reg mi 'gyur// gang gis mthong dang sti stang byed ci smos// de na rgyal
123a8(mdo sde): bas dge slong gang sprul pa// kun dga' bzang po zhes ni bya ba des// rgyal bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba// byang chub zhugs pa su mchis de la zhus// kun dga' bzang po go cha dpa' de'i
123b1(mdo sde): ming // 'jig rten khams 'dir yod ces ngas thos na/ zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis brjod par bya// de ltar bde bar gshegs pas zab bstan pa// rgyal ba'i byang chub yid ches dka' ba yis/ 
123b2(mdo sde): sems can dge ba chung dang ldan pa lhags// da ltar nga yis tshe ni cung zad gnas// kun dga' 'di na sems can mchog yod de// de ring kho nar 'khor du lhags par gyur// 'jig rten mgon
123b3(mdo sde): po gang dag 'dir lhags pa'o// go cha bsngags pa phyogs bcur bzlog mi nus// kun dga' bzang skyong rin chen 'byung gnas dang // dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang ni ded dpon bzang // 
123b4(mdo sde): yon tan sbas pa mkhas dang de bzhin du// dpa' bo ba rang stobs gang yin de la ltos// chu zhes bya ba dang ni chu lha dang // bzang skyong de bzhin dge slong ci 'dra rnams// ji ltar skyob
123b5(mdo sde): gyur dge slong de dag ltos// de dag rnams kyi go cha de bsam yas// don yod ces ni yongs su bsgrags gyur pa// de dag gis ni don yod go cha bgos// de dag mthong ba'ang don yod
123b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin// de dag bsnyen bkur byed pa smos ci dgos// kun dga' gang su dag gis de dag mthong // gang dag su yis ming yang thos gyur pa// de dag na ma yang byang chub dogs pa med// 
123b7(mdo sde): de dag nam du'ang log par ltung mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad brtson pas tshogs pa yin// de dag thams cad shes pas tshogs par gyur// rtag tu tshul khrims phung pos de rtag gnas// thams
123b8(mdo sde): cad theg pa mchog la de ltar 'dun// kun dga' sangs rgyas zhing 'dir phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten de ltar gang dag su gnas pa// dpa' bo de ci go cha 'dod gyur pa// de la rgyal ba kun gyis
124a1(mdo sde): bsngags pa brjod// gang gis bsngags brjod rgyal ba de dag kyang // byang chub sems dpa' de tshe der shes te// shAkya khyu mchog 'jig rten mgon po dang // byang
124a2(mdo sde): chu ba zhugs pa'i dpa' bo de dag blta'o// de thos nas kyang gsol ba btab gyur pa// mgon po mi mjed 'jig rten khamasu mchi// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la bskor byas nas// byang chub sems
124a3(mdo sde): dpa' de dag thams cad lhags// dge slong de dag gi yang ming thos nas// de tshe byang chub mchog tu 'dun pa skyed// gang dag ming dang 'dun pas byang chub zhugs// de dag rgyal bas byang chub der
124a4(mdo sde): lung bstan// bskal pa grangs med dag tu las byas shing // / mi dge bsgrubs pa gang dag su yod pa// de phyir snyigs mi'i dus na de dag ni// nga dang lhan cig sangs rgyas zhing du
124a5(mdo sde): lhags// nga yis byang chub mchog 'di thob gyur kyang // de tshe sems can blta bar spro ba med// gang dag phyi dus dge slong rnams 'byung ba// rtsub dang gtum dang shin tu rtsub/ 
124a6(mdo sde): pa yin// de tshe kun tu 'jigs pa thos nas su// yang dang yang du brtson 'grus stobs skyed cing // mu ge'i dus su rngan rjen sbyin pa byin// de dag rnams kyi sbyin pa rtsub yin// de dag 'di la gus
124a7(mdo sde): pa che byas nas// phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po de'i tshe// srog kyang btang nas don ni bya snyam te// nga yi chos mchog spel zhing 'dzin par byed// dus de na ni mi dge' las rnams kyi// smon lam
124a8(mdo sde): gnas kyang 'jig rten dag na yod// 'di na las de dag ni byas pas na/ de yi tshe na brnyas pa'i tshul du 'gyur// de dag der ni 'di 'dra'i chos thos nas// de che der ni chos min 'du shes
124b1(mdo sde): 'gyur// chos 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa ma yin zhes// 'jig rten phyin ci log la kun dga' ltos// de tshe dge slong slob pas 'du byed la// rtag pa cung zad med ces skyo thob pas// de tshe mgol me
124b2(mdo sde): 'bar bzhin du rtogs// mchi med thob par bya phyir ma lus btsal// bstan 'di rab tu rnam par 'jig thob nas// der ni lha yong sdug bsngal dag tu gyur// de tshe 'jigs pa mthong na mi rung zhes// 
124b3(mdo sde): da lta'i dus su shi yang bla snyam sems// bag cha med pa'i sgrogs pa sgrogs pa yis// drang srong che de de ring bdag cag mthong // 'dren pa mchog gzhal du lta byed cing // kye ma rgyal bas bshad
124b4(mdo sde): ces yid rang so// dge slong bsam gtan byed pa dag kyang mthong // dbang thob rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mkhas gyur pa// 'di na ting 'dzin shes rab pha rol phyin// de dag phyi ma'i dusu
124b5(mdo sde): ji ltar mthong // sdig pa'i dge slong stobs dang ldan 'gyur/ zhing // de che tshul ldan shin tu tshar gcad 'gyur// gan sa khang gnas pa tshegs kyis 'thob 'gyur zhing // de tshe lha
124b6(mdo sde): yid shin tu mi dga' 'gyur// kye ma kye ma bstan pa rab tu 'jig/ gang gi don du de tshe dka' spyod pa// de dag dge slong sdig pas tshar gcad 'gyur// bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la
124b7(mdo sde): ltos// 'dir ni phan tshun kun tu dga' bar 'gyur// nges pa rnams la de dag sngags min brjod// sangs rgyas la ni 'khrug long byed pa dag/ de dag khyim na gnas pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 
124b8(mdo sde): dag bsnyen ma dang 'dre bar byed 'gyur zhing // de na de dag lag pa gcig tu byed// rgyal ba'i bstan la ma gus gyur na su// byang chub mchog kyang spong bar byed par 'gyur// dkon mchog gsu
125a1(mdo sde): la mchog tu 'che 'gyur te/ de dag rtag tu nges pa rnams kyis spangs// khyu mchog rwa chag ma gyur ma rungs pa// de bzhin tshul khrims ldan pa rnam par spong // de tshe tshul khrims/ 
125a2(mdo sde): ldan pa dpyas 'gyur zhing // de tshe dge slong sdig pas brnyas tshul 'gyur// 'jigs chen phyin ci log gi dus su ni// skyo ba thob byos bag kyang yod par gyis// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la
125a3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus skyed// de tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i dge slong rnams dang 'phrad ma byed// de'i tshe na sdug bsngal gnas par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun
125a4(mdo sde): tubaltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sku da stobs kyi go cha bgos/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar
125a5(mdo sde): byed pa 'am/ brkyang bskum par byed pa'i skad cig des// de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mo mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
125a6(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan
125a7(mdo sde): 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sku kun tu ston pa'i khyu
125a8(mdo sde): mchog snyan gsol lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyan mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ des gsol
125b1(mdo sde): pa// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan med nga ro
125b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdapa chags na/ 'jig
125b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'dzin med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
125b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan nyid gcig pas ma/ chod ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba
125b5(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mchog ce sa bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
125b6(mdo sde): pad+ma rab tu gtor ba'i char pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i
125b7(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs brtsegs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags
125b8(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
126a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab mu khyud 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye
126a2(mdo sde): me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshabs 'dzin rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab
126a3(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha' rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
126a4(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dang / ra rgyal tshab rin chen gdugs shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
126a5(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs par ba tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem
126a6(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab ud pa la zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med khyu mchog ces bya ba
126a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems dpa' med ces bya ba btangango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig
126a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad so sor bag yangs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
126b1(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zab mo 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs/ 
126b2(mdo sde): pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'gro ba 'dzin ces bya ba bta/ 
126b3(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
126b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'ji gra rten gyi khams gnod med ces bya ba yod de/ de na
126b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs par gshegs pa zhes bya ba bzhu// gas te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
126b6(mdo sde): rgyal tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ud pa la dmar pos khabs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyis
126b7(mdo sde): rgyags mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab
126b8(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kha lo bsgyur ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gzigs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
127a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshad rtul ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs chen zhes bya ba yod de
127a2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang/ 
127a3(mdo sde): ngo// de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig su rung bas mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te
127a4(mdo sde): 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogasu rab grags zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na
127a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhug/ sa te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
127a6(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsho ba sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ma
127a7(mdo sde): sgron zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi mdzin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten
127a8(mdo sde): gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
127b1(mdo sde): rnam par sgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'dren zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gyen du gshegs shes bya ba
127b2(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten
127b3(mdo sde): gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
127b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab rab kyi blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje' byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par
127b5(mdo sde): gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la rmo/ sa kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sa mas dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // 
127b6(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nga ro can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
127b7(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdapa chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
127b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
128a1(mdo sde): smon lam rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde
128a2(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dkar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags
128a3(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skya reng zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon+dan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
128a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ded dpon zhes bya ba da tang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
128a5(mdo sde): pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gan sa la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byung / chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i snga zhes bya ba
128a6(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
128a7(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes
128a8(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen
128b1(mdo sde): dbang phyug ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te
128b2(mdo sde): 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
128b3(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
128b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tsha ba ye shes brtson 'grus shes bya ba btang /  // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
128b5(mdo sde): bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde ba ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
128b6(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shi 'phos med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mngon 'phags dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bco
128b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog bzang zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yo ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
128b8(mdo sde): pabartag tu dpung mgo mtho zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu spro ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // 
129a1(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu kun tu 'khrugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
129a2(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab snying rje chen po'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes
129a3(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa mtha' yas pas gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
129a4(mdo sde): rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skabs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba yod do/ de na de bzhin
129a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshogs
129a6(mdo sde): chen zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing
129a7(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshob sems tshad med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
129a8(mdo sde): gser 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
129b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab mig po che zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun gyi khyu mchog ces bya
129b2(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dga' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
129b3(mdo sde): khams gdugs kyis khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs mchog mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
129b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyan ra sa gzigs nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'imadab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgyu skar gyi phreng
129b5(mdo sde): ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgyu ska ra gyi phreng ba can de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la
129b6(mdo sde): chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs
129b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
129b8(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
130a1(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na pad+ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
130a2(mdo sde): gser can zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
130a3(mdo sde): tsha ba mig rnam par dag ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal
130a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang / ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems da dpa' rgyal tshab mig ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab
130a5(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gsung mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
130a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
130a7(mdo sde): palhun po mngon du 'phags shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang // 
130a8(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal tshab sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
130b1(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba
130b2(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes
130b3(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' 'dzin ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
130b4(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub se/ mas dpa' rgyal tshab yid gnyis rnam par 'joms// shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig
130b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams tsan dan spos shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid gnyis pa'i rtog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
130b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod de
130b7(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
130b8(mdo sde): tshab dgra rab tu 'jom pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal zhes bya ba
131a1(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdaba' chags
131a2(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos
131a3(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod de
131a4(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba ba zhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshag
131a5(mdo sde): don gyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bsgoms shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
131a6(mdo sde): me zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshob dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 
131a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis mnan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis thams cad yang dag par 'joms 'byung zhes bya ba bzhags te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
131a8(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes
131b1(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rim pa'i sras zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma
131b2(mdo sde): 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
131b3(mdo sde): gzhes la tshos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bshes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos mchog
131b4(mdo sde): ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la tshe/ nas kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
131b5(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
131b6(mdo sde): 'od zer rab btang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thams cad bshes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo // 
131b7(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprin chen zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
131b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
132a1(mdo sde): pad+ma snang ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab chos 'phags shes bya ba
132a2(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la ches kyang / 
132a3(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mngon du 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i gnas shes bya ba yod de/ 
132a4(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces dbya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
132a5(mdo sde): chab pa shes gnyen grags ldan zhes bya btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhas bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i lhun po
132a6(mdo sde): mngon du 'phags shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bta // de'i
132a7(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
132a8(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba dbang po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
132b1(mdo sde): bdon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyas ma ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig rten
132b2(mdo sde): gyi khams rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
132b3(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu rab brjod ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
132b4(mdo sde): pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'a dadas des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgrogs byed ces
132b5(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zas kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa med pa'i go che zhe bya ba bzhags
132b6(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
132b7(mdo sde): khams tsan dan gsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' las zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
